V05bhivin_u:2558: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati /
V05bhivin_u:2560: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sasūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇamudghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2561: astamite sūrye vinā bhūtā aruṇamudghātayati thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2562: bhikṣuṇīvihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hastapāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2566: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2567: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2568: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2570: atha dāni dvibhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime /
V05bhivin_u:2573: yā punabhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi vinā ekarātram pi vipravasiya anyatrasamaye /
V05bhivin_u:2575: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo /
V05bhivin_u:2579: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭagaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī /
V05bhivin_u:2593: taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati /
V05bhivin_u:2608: so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:2612: pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha /
V05bhivin_u:2615: prāptakālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2623: ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ bandhāpayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:2625: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti /
V05bhivin_u:2626: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahājanakāyasyārocayati /
V05bhivin_u:2627: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti /
V05bhivin_u:2628: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2637: evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:2638: tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2640: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:2643: na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā /
V05bhivin_u:2647: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī /
V05bhivin_u:2648: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:2651: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā /
V05bhivin_u:2652: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditukāmāsi /
V05bhivin_u:2654: yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṅkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty /
V05bhivin_u:2673: sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dārike /
V05bhivin_u:2674: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā /
V05bhivin_u:2675: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:2680: yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalānaḥ kiṃ bhūyo nivartitaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2681: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2688: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2690: iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2691: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti /
V05bhivin_u:2693: iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:2694: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti /
V05bhivin_u:2699: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2700: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2701: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2703: anujñāpakehi ananujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātāpitarau anujñāpakā /
V05bhivin_u:2706: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:2708: upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā /
V05bhivin_u:2713: vūḍhā vaktavyā patidevarau śvaśruśvaśurāv anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:2715: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:2720: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā parapuruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:2724: 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2727: na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2728: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā /
V05bhivin_u:2729: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ svadharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2731: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati /
V05bhivin_u:2732: sā saptadivasāni dānavisargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2735: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā /
V05bhivin_u:2736: itikitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca /
V05bhivin_u:2737: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2738: sā dāni ubhayato jñātisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati /
V05bhivin_u:2740: kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:2744: api tu ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:2754: sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛcchapṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā /
V05bhivin_u:2775: putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ gopāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:2789: prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2795: caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritukāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2796: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalakakalyāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:2798: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ rājakule bhandhāpemi /
V05bhivin_u:2800: yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca /
V05bhivin_u:2802: eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca /
V05bhivin_u:2803: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ mahājanakāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati /
V05bhivin_u:2804: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:2806: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2809: evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:2810: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2814: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:2817: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti /
V05bhivin_u:2824: idānīṃ sā itikitikāya dhītā sumahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena /
V05bhivin_u:2826: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:2827: sā pi dāni tena tīrthikabhāvena tīrthikabhāvenārtīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2831: nagnā ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo istrikāmā pi dūṣenti /
V05bhivin_u:2833: moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā /
V05bhivin_u:2847: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2849: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye /
V05bhivin_u:2853: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:2855: viditān ti ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya mātṛpakṣasya pitṛpakṣasya ca /
V05bhivin_u:2857: jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭhavaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṅkumālāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2859: keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:2860: keṣāñcit vālukāghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati /
V05bhivin_u:2863: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇamukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati /
V05bhivin_u:2865: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati /
V05bhivin_u:2866: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:2869: taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇamukhe prakṣipīyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2871: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2875: carakaparivrājakanirgranthājīvakatredaṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautamadharmacintakāḥ vṛddhaśrāvakaḥ dakatṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2876: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:2880: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:2888: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2890: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:2893: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā /
V05bhivin_u:2901: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:2903: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi /
V05bhivin_u:2904: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2905: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2906: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:2907: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:2910: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti /
V05bhivin_u:2913: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2916: athavaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2917: yāvad evam aparāparanti sarvāḥ thūl'-accayam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:2918: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hastapāśena snātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2921: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya /
V05bhivin_u:2926: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāmacārikāṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:2927: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena utkṣepanīyakarma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2936: sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:2938: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:2943: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya /
V05bhivin_u:2949: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu /
V05bhivin_u:2951: evaṃ traivācikaṃ pratyosāritā āryamiśrikā iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:2953: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:2954: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ceti na kācit pratikṣipati /
V05bhivin_u:2959: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:2967: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2972: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:2974: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2979: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:2981: svayam vā jāne parato vā śrutvā /
V05bhivin_u:2989: akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ ti prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇīyo asaṃjñāpayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:2991: saṃghamadhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet /
V05bhivin_u:2993: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:2998: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:2999: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3009: tasyāḥ saṃghena amukasmin vastuni utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3013: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgham itthannāmā pratyosāraṇāṃ yāceya /
V05bhivin_u:3019: atha tatra kācit pṛatihati karmakriyamāṇe prakṛtisthābhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3021: bhikṣur api jānan bhikṣuṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati sthūlātyayam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3023: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānanti bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ akṛtāṃ akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā bhikṣuṇīsaṃghaṃ svayam eva pratyosārayati /
V05bhivin_u:3033: jānāsi ārye kasya vayam arthāya āryāya dadāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3041: ayaṃ tv aham āryāya arthikaḥ āryāya dadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3045: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahaprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3054: nanu te paścimā nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3056: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3058: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī anavaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pratigṛhṇīyāt pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā bhakṣyaṃ vā bhojyaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā ayam api dharmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3059: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yāvad upasampannā ubhayataḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:3063: pātram iti jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyamaṃ kanyasam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3067: antaśaḥ glānabhaiṣajyam iti saptāhikaṃ vā yāvajjīvikam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3070: eṣo tāvan manuṣyo bhikṣuṇīya dadāti pātram vā cīvaram /
V05bhivin_u:3078: tavaiva bhavatu dīrghāyuḥ labhiṣyāmaḥ vayam anyato pi /
V05bhivin_u:3080: atha vācaṃ na bhāṣati hastavikāraṃ vā pādavikāraṃ vā akṣivikāraṃ vā karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3087: atha khalu denaṃ deti prasannair indriyaiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3088: atha khalu tayā bhikṣuṇyā āśayena pratīcchitavyaṃ pratīcchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3089: evaṃ bhikṣor api raktacittā strī dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:3095: yā puna bhikṣuṇī avaśrutā avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātram cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā pratigṛhṇeya ayam api dharmo prathamāpattiko /
V05bhivin_u:3099: na kṣamati avaśrutasya puruṣasya pātraṃ vā yāvat pratigṛhṇātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3100: sā jetā tasya puruṣasya na praticchati /
V05bhivin_u:3108: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vada /
V05bhivin_u:3110: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3114: dvitīyam tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3115: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayanti /
V05bhivin_u:3122: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3124: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīṃ evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3130: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā etad eva vastuṃ pratigṛhya tiṣtheya na pratinissaret /
V05bhivin_u:3131_0: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya
V05bhivin_u:3131_1: vastusya pratiniḥsargāya yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā
V05bhivin_u:3131_2: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3134: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3135: tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm iti yathā tāṃ jetāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3137: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3139: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tad evaṃ vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3140: ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyakaḥ yathā bhikṣuvinaye /
V05bhivin_u:3144: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3146: kiṃ te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3149: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3150: mā ārye etāṃ bhikṣuṇīm evaṃ vade /
V05bhivin_u:3152: kin te paro kariṣyati avaśruto vā anavaśruto vā /
V05bhivin_u:3155: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3157: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanuśāsitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3158: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā samanubhāṣyamāṇā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3159: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3163: dvau bhedena tathaiva kartavyo yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:3164: yā puna bhikṣuṇī samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya bhedanasamvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3165: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3166: mā ārye samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākrameya /
V05bhivin_u:3167: bhedanasamvartanīyam vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3169: samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodayamāna avivadamāno /
V05bhivin_u:3170: ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ sukhañ ca phāsuñ ca viharati /
V05bhivin_u:3171: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3173: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3174: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3178: tasyāḥ khalu bhikṣuṇyā bhikṣuṇyo bhavanti sahāyikā /
V05bhivin_u:3179: ekā vā dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā /
V05bhivin_u:3182: mā āryamiśrikāḥ etāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kiñcid avavadittha /
V05bhivin_u:3184: dharmavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī vinayavādinī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3185: asmākaṃ caiṣā bhikṣuṇī chandañ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati /
V05bhivin_u:3186: yañ caitasyāḥ bhikṣuṇyāḥ kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
V05bhivin_u:3187: jānantī caiṣā bhikṣuṇī bhāṣate no ajānanti /
V05bhivin_u:3188: tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3195: sahito sammodayamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3197: evañ ca tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ ucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3198: no ce pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇyo bhikṣuṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3199: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3201: tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3206: tatra sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī adhikaraṇāny utpādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3208: sā saṃghaṃ ākrośati saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:3218: mā ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpaya /
V05bhivin_u:3221: yāvan na mohan niśrāya yāvad āryā evaṃ chandagāmī /
V05bhivin_u:3222: mā ārye chandan niśrāya saṃgham ākroṣitavyam manyasi paribhāṣitavyam manyasi /
V05bhivin_u:3223: sā tvam evam ucyamānī na pratikramasi dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhyucyamāni na pratikramasi /
V05bhivin_u:3228: tṛṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3230: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3231: alam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3232: yāvat khalu te ārye mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣiṇīya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3237: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3240: sā tāva saṃghamadhye pi vaktavyā peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3242: anubhāṣṭā bhagavan āryā nandā triṣkṛtvā kuvege triṣkṛtvā mahājane triṣkṛtvā saṃghamadhye etasya vastunaḥ pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3251: nanv ahaṃ nande anekaparyāyeṇa daurvacasyaṃ vigarhāmi yāvan naivaṃ kurvato vṛddhir bhavati kūśaleṣu dharmeṣu atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3266: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3275: ārye ca chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃgham ākrośitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3276: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamāna tad eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3277: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇībhiḥ yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3278: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamānā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etat kuślaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3281: yāvad eṣā bhikṣuṇī triṣkṛtvā kuvege samanugrāhiyamānā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:3283: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3286: evam dvitīyātṛtīyām vā vācāyāṃ yāvad vyavaropitāyāṃ saṃghātiśeṣaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3291: sthūlātyayāḥ sarve te pratiprasrabhyanti sthāpayitvā aṣṭau sthūlātyayāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3294: kathaṃ tāvat pratiniḥ sargārhaṃ katham apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3295: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpayāmi prāpayiṣyāmi ceti evaṃ pratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3297: abhūṣi me saṃgham agatigamanena prāpayiṣyan ti prāpitañ ca /
V05bhivin_u:3298: na khalv idānīṃ prāpayāmi na ca prāpayiṣyāmīty apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3304: saṃgho doṣagāmī ca bhayagāmī ca saṃgho /
V05bhivin_u:3306: chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya samākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3307: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3313: na ca saṃgho chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohaṃ niśrāya āryām ākrośitavyām paribhāṣitavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3314: āryā evaṃ chandagāminī doṣagāminī bhayagāminī mohagāminī /
V05bhivin_u:3315: āryā eva chandan niśrāya doṣaṃ bhayaṃ mohan niśrāya saṃegham ākrośitavyaṃ roṣitavyaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3317: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhir ucyamānā tam evi vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭhet /
V05bhivin_u:3319: sā bhikṣuṇ bhikṣunībhir yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3321: taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etat kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3328: sā uddeśaparyavasānehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā /
V05bhivin_u:3333: sā uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3335: mā me āryamiśrikāyo kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇam vā pāpakaṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:3336: aham apy āryamiśrikāṇān na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇam vā pāpakam vā /
V05bhivin_u:3338: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3339: mā ārye uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣuṇīhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamānā ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
V05bhivin_u:3341: āryā pi bhikṣuṇīyo vadantu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:3342: āryam api bhikṣuṇīyo vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
V05bhivin_u:3343: evaṃ saṃvṛddhā khalu punar ārye tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyavacanīyā anyamanyāpattivyutthāpanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3344: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3346: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3347: yāvāttṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇa vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3348: no ca pratiniḥsareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3352: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā hi viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3356: kinti dāni kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3361: māryamiśrikāyo kāyikena saṃsargeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā viharatha mā vācikena mā kāyikavācikena /
V05bhivin_u:3364: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramanti /
V05bhivin_u:3365: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tā bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3368: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu punar dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3370: tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3373: nānā vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3375: evaṃ ca tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3377: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tā bhikṣuṇīyo bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3378: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsuḥ itya etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3379: no ca pratinissareṃsuḥ tam evam vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3381: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3384: tā bhikṣuṇīyo yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3390: yāvat tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3391: yaṃ taṃ vastuṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti anyamanyasyāvadyāni praticchādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:3392: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhitā /
V05bhivin_u:3393: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3394: trikkhutto kuvege trikkhutto mahājane trikkhutto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3395: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3396: no ca pratiniḥsareṃsuḥ ayam api dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:3399: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastun na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3400: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3403: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3412: abhūṣi khalu mo saṃsṛṣṭā vihariṣyāmo anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti te dānīm viharāmo vihariṣyāmo na vihṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3415: bhikṣuṇīyo khalu puna dve saṃsṛṣṭāyo viharanti anyonyasyāvadyapraticchādikā /
V05bhivin_u:3422: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīhi saṃsṛṣṭā viharitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:3423: nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māśorakadhītā bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharanti /
V05bhivin_u:3427: tāsāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3431: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3432: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3434: mā ārye nande etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada saṃsṛṣṭā eva āryamiśrikāyo viharatha /
V05bhivin_u:3438: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3439: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3442: yady eṣā sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī nandāṃ śākyakanyāṃ uttarāṃ ca māśorakadhītām evam āha /
V05bhivin_u:3446: dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3447: tena hi gacchatha nantrikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhayatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3449: satyaṃ tvam ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evam vadasi yāvad āmo ty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3451: mā ārye nande etā bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ vada /
V05bhivin_u:3453: yaṃ khalu te ārye nande mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāye hitaiṣiṇīye anukampikāya anukampām upādāya karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3454: taṃ mitrā ekā vācā gacchati dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsarāmity āha /
V05bhivin_u:3457: evaṃ eva yāvad anubhāṣṭā na pratiniḥsarati /
V05bhivin_u:3459: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3466: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3467: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3469: saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3471: kiṃ punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃghe /
V05bhivin_u:3473: na ca tāsāṃ saṃgho kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3474: yuṣmān eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhāvena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3475: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3476: mā ārye nande itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
V05bhivin_u:3479: nānāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo viharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi /
V05bhivin_u:3481: kim punar yūyam eva evaṃrūpā saṃsṛṣṭā saṃghe /
V05bhivin_u:3483: na ca saṃgho tāsāṃ kiñcid āha /
V05bhivin_u:3484: yuṣmākam eva saṃgho avajñāya paribhavena omarditavyāṃ parimarditavyām manyati /
V05bhivin_u:3485: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratinissareya /
V05bhivin_u:3486: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3487: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3491: tā bhikṣuṇīyo ti yathā nandā ca śākyakanyā uttarā ca māsorakadhītā /
V05bhivin_u:3493: saṃsṛṣṭā eva yūyam āryamiśrikāyo viharatha anyamanyasyāvadyapraticchādikā ti kāyikena vācikena kāyikavācikena saṃsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:3494: mā nānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ vo 'dhiviharantīnāṃ vṛddhir eva pratikāṅkṣitavyā kuśalehi dharmehi na parihāṇiḥ / peyālaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3496: bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3500: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakam ti trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:3502: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme itthannāmāṃ ca itthannāmāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīm yāvad āmo ty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3504: mā ārye itthannāmāñ ca itthannāmāñ ca bhikṣuṇīṃ nānā viharantīṃ anuvicārehi /
V05bhivin_u:3508: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3509: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3512: yāvat kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3513: abhūṣi khalu ime itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3518: abhūṣi khalu me itthannāmāyo bhikṣuṇīyo vadiṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3521: vaditaṃ khalu me idānīm vadāmi na vadiṣyāmi ceti evam apratiniḥsargārham draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3523: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīyo nānā viharantīyo evam vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:3525: yāvad ayaṃ pi dharmo yāvat tṛtīyako /
V05bhivin_u:3530: tahiṃ dānī dve mātādhītare agārasyānagārikāṃ pravrajite /
V05bhivin_u:3534: kiṃ vayaṃ jīvantikā eva anyamanyaṃ na paśyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3538: na mayā yathā vā tathā vā śakyam āgantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3540: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi saha vāco vācikaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3541: sā yadā paryādinnā bhavati tadā āha /
V05bhivin_u:3543: evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3549: mā ārye buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvat mā śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3550: asādhu ārye buddhapratyākhyānaṃ yāvad asādhu śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3552: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam pi uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3553: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3563: dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam apy uktā na pratikramati /
V05bhivin_u:3565: tāṃ trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhatha samanubhāṣatha etasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3567: satyaṃ tvam ārye itthannāme śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsi /
V05bhivin_u:3568: sā tvam evam vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3570: yāvat kiṃ punar etā eva śramaṇikā śākyaputrīyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3574: sā tvaṃ kuvege vuccasi mā tvam ārye itthannāme buddhaṃ pratyākhyāhi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3577: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ arthakāmāya hitaiṣīṇīye karoti /
V05bhivin_u:3579: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratinissarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3581: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo bhagavato ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3590: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3595: dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3599: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3602: mā dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śikṣām uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇibhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3608: evañ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pratigṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3609: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3610: yāvat tṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3614: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti yathā sā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:3615: śikṣāpratyākhyāyikā ti sā evam āha buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3621: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3622: mā ārye buddhaṃ praytākhyāhi yāvad asādhu ārye śākyaputrīya bhāvapratyākhyānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3623: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vucyamānā tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya na pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3625: sā bhikṣuṇīhīti saṃghena mahājanena ekapudgalena yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhato saṃghamadhye /
V05bhivin_u:3627: satyaṃ tvam itthannāme evaṃ vadasi buddhaṃ pratyākhyāmi yāvac chākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3632: yaṃ khalu te ārye itthannāmāya mitrāya karaṇīyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3635: dve vācā avaśiṣṭā pratiniḥsara na pratiniḥsarāmīty āha /
V05bhivin_u:3638: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3639: no ca pratiniḥsareya ayam api dharmo yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3640_0: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī trikkhatto kuvege trikkhatto mahājane trikkhatto saṃghamadhye samanugrāhiyamāṇā
V05bhivin_u:3640_1: vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā pratiniḥsargārhaṃ vastuṃ na pratiniḥsarati vācāyāṃ vācāyāṃ
V05bhivin_u:3641: evaṃ mahājane saṃghamadhye jñaptim adhivāsayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3644: evaṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ vācāyām adhyoropitāyāṃ thūl'-accayam /
V05bhivin_u:3646: yadā saṃghātiṣeśam āpattim āpannā bhavati tadā ye ca kuvege ye ca mahājane ye ca saṃghamadhye thūl'-accayā ca vinayātikramā ca sarve te pratiprasrabhyante /
V05bhivin_u:3647: ekā gurukā āpattiḥ saṃsthihati yad idaṃ saṃghātiśeṣo /
V05bhivin_u:3649: kin ti dāni pratiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kim apratiniḥsargārhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3651: na khalu me pratyākhyānaṃ prtiniḥsargārhaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3653: abhūṣi khalu me śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāsyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:3654: pratyākhyātam dāni na pratyākhyāsi pratyākhyāmi ceti /
V05bhivin_u:3662: uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ saṃbhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāmi /
V05bhivin_u:3666: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam asya vacanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:3671: mā uddeśaṃ samvāsaṃ sambhogaṃ śāstṛpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ śramaṇībhāvaṃ śākyaputrīya bhāvaṃ pratyākhyāhi /
V05bhivin_u:3679: evaṃ ca sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi vuccamānā taṃ eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya /
V05bhivin_u:3681: sā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyā tasya vastusya pratiniḥsargāya /
V05bhivin_u:3682: yāvattṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamānā vā tam vastuṃ pratiniḥsareya /
V05bhivin_u:3687: uddiṣṭā me āryamiśrikāyo ekūnaviṃśati saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3689: yeṣāṃ bhikṣuṇī ity anyatarānyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā ardhamāsaṃ ubhayato saṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3691: āhvayanapratibaddhā yatra syād viṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tatra sā bhikṣuṇī āhvayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:3692: ekenāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo ubhayato saṃgho tāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āhveya /
V05bhivin_u:3694: te ca bhikṣavo tāś ca bhikṣuṇīyo garhyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3700: pariśuddhā atrāryamiśrikāyo yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi / uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3732: tā dāni striyo kācin māñcasya mūlyan denti /
V05bhivin_u:3739: āryāye nandāye mayā mañcasya mūlyaṃ dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3743: khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3746: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3752: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3760: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3762: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3765: śayyāsanaṃ nāma mañcaṃ pīṭhaṃ bisi caturasraṃ kuccaṃ bimbohanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3768: pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3769: nissargikapācattikaṃ ti saṃghe nissariya pācatikaṃ deśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3776: tam vastuṃ na darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3777: khaṇḍaṃ pralugnaṃ vā vā lepanikām vā kartuṃ kumbhiyo upasthāpayituṃ bhikṣur api śayanāsanasyārthāya yācayitvā anyaṃ cetāpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:3778: vastun darśetvā labhyaṃ khaṇḍaṃ pralugnādi kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3780: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śayyāsanasyārthāya yācitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānabhaiṣajyaṃ vā cetāpaye niḥsargikapācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:3784: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi khaṇḍena pātreṇa chidravichidreṇa piṇḍapātam aṇvati /
V05bhivin_u:3790: ahan te ārye pātrasya mūlyaṃ demi /
V05bhivin_u:3798: sā khādati ca pibati ca naiva pātraṃ na cīvaraṃ jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3801: mayā āryāye nandāye pātrasya mūlyan dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3806: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3811: satyaṃ nande evan nāma tvaṃ nande anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3815: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad evaṃ nāma tvam anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3816: tena hi na kṣamati anyoddeśikenānyaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3817: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3818: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśikena anyaṃ cetāpayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3821: anyaṃ cetāpayed iti bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3823: eṣo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kācit pātram vā cīvaram vā ghṛtam vā tailam vā cetāpayituṃ mūlyan deti /
V05bhivin_u:3828: atha aniyataṃ deti yaṃ icchati taṃ jānāpeti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3832: bhikṣavor apy evam eva āpattis tu vinayātikaramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3834: yam vā icchasi taṃ gṛhṇāhīti taṃ gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3836: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyoddeśakenānyaṃ cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3840: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktakāni samādāyeti /
V05bhivin_u:3844: tā dāni striyo chandakaṃ prajantīntīyo jalpanti /
V05bhivin_u:3847: atha sā khādati ca pibati ca pātraṃ ca jānāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3848: tāya khāditāvaśeṣeṇa yādṛśaṃ vā bhaktaṃ kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3858: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3863: satyaṃ nande evannāma tvam anyeṣām arthāya yācitvā anyaṃ cetāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:3867: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajapatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3868: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3869: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān vā cetāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:3872_0: anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā saṃghasya bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā yācitvā
V05bhivin_u:3872_1: ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhaktam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān
V05bhivin_u:3873: atha khalu yasyārthāya yācati tam eva jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3874: atha dāni vastraṃ vipraṇāmeti bhaktasya vā tarpaṇasya vā yvāgūpānasya vā arthāya yācayitvā vaibhaṅgikaṃ dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:3875: śayyāsanam vā upasthāpeti vārṣikam vā hemantikam vā deti /
V05bhivin_u:3877: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya bhaktaṃ dāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:3879: yadi tahiṃ kiñcic cheṣaṃ bhavati odanam vā sūpam vā yāvad bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā upadarśayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3890: bhikṣor api evam eva āpattis tu vinyātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3892: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anyeṣām arthāya yācayitvā ātmano pātram vā cīvaram vā bhakṣyam vā bhojyam vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārān vā cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3898: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāva pātrāṇi saṃkrāmayemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3899: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3908: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:3917: evañ ca nāma yūyaṃ pātrasannicayaṃ karotha /
V05bhivin_u:3918: tena hi na kṣamati pātrasannicayaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3919: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:3920: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:3921: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3923: pātrasannicayan ti pātran nāma sumbhakaṃ upasambhakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3927: sannicayaṃ kuryād iti saṃgrahaṃ kuryān nissargikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3935: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhaṃ pātradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3936: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bahukāny api pātrāṇi vikalpetvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3938: yā puna bhikṣuṇī pātrasannicayaṃ kuryān niḥsargikapācattikaṃ
V05bhivin_u:3944: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ yāvac cīvarāṇi saṃkrāmemaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3945: tāyo dāni anastamite sūrye pravṛttāḥ saṃkrāmayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3955: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3963: etaṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīye parimāṇaṃ baddhañ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3964: kiñcāpi bhikṣu bahukāni cīvarāṇi mitrāṇāṃ vikalpayitvā paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3970: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī cīvarāṇi naiva dhovati na sīveti na rañjeti /
V05bhivin_u:3972: upāśraye nikṣiptā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3975: ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhoviya sīviya phoṣiya prāvṛtā /
V05bhivin_u:3977: ānehi ārye etāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ mahyaṃ eṣā saṃghāṭī /
V05bhivin_u:3978: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo na kiñcic chakyate upāśraye nikṣipituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3980: dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca sā dāni tāya saṃghāṭī ācchinnā /
V05bhivin_u:3981: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3984: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇyupāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3985: uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādiyeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3992: yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti paścāt svayam eva upādīyeta niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3993: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīupāśraye cīvaraṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti yadi kāci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3995: atha dāni na kāyaci upādinnam bhavati tasyā eva ca tāya artho bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:3996: atha dāni kṣudrānukṣudrakaṃ pariṣkāraṃ nikṣiptam bhavati yadi kāyaci upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchindituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:3998: bhikṣur api bhikṣuvihāre pātram vā cīvaram vā upānaham vā kṣudrānukṣudrakam vā pariṣkāraṃ nikṣipitvā yo icchati so upādīyatū ti /
V05bhivin_u:3999: yadi kenacid upādinnam bhavati na kṣamati ācchincituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4001: atha na kenacid gṛhītam bhavati so eva tenārthiko bhavati kiñcāpi gṛhṇāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4003: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇy upāśraye purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ nikṣipetvā vā nikṣipāyetvā vā yā icchati sā upādīyatū ti uktvā paścāt svayam eva upādīyeya niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4007: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya purāṇasaṃghāṭī omalinamalinā dhovitvā niḥsīvitvā ātape dattvā vāto ca pravāpito /
V05bhivin_u:4010: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti /
V05bhivin_u:4012: evan nāma tvaṃ purāṇasaṃghāṭīṃ niḥsīvitvā na pratisaṃdhaisi na pratisandhāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:4015: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo lecchavi kanyāyo sukumārāyo bhārikāṃ saṃghāṭiṃ dhovantīyo kilamyanti /
V05bhivin_u:4016: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4020: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīm gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4022: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭiṃ niḥsīvitvā niḥsivāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātram agilānā na pratisandhāye na pratisandhāpayena niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4028: uttarīti ṣaṭpañcarātram iti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca /
V05bhivin_u:4029: atha khalu paramaṃ ṣaṭrātran na pratisandheyaiti svayaṃ na pratisandhāpeyā ti pareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:4033: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye saṃghāṭī malinā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4034: yadi tāva lahukā bhoti tathā yeva dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4036: atha dāni sārikā bhoti niḥsīvetvā niḥsīvitvā dhovitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4038: sāharitvā gopiṭake vā kuṇḍake vā paṭalake vā sthāpayitvā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā ākramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4040: atha dāni bhājanan na bhavati ekasthāne ākramiya iṣṭakena vā upalakhaṇḍena vā sthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4041: paścād antevāsiṇīya vā samānopādhyāyinīyā vā bhikṣuṇīya pratisandhāpayitavyā svayam vā pratisandhetavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4042: atha dāni jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati kiñcāpi cireṇa pratisandheti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4044: yā puna bhikṣuṇī purāṇasaṃghāṭīn niḥsīvitvā vā niḥsīvāpetvā vā uttari ṣaṭpañcarātraṃ aglānā na pratisandhe vā na pratisandhāpeya vā niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4052: yadi cīvaram desi tato ham upasampādemi /
V05bhivin_u:4058: evam eva yāva sā vilakṣeti nopasampādeti /
V05bhivin_u:4059: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4062: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evam uktvā yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyāmīti tāye cīvaraṃ gṛhya nopasampādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4065: yadi me cīvaraṃ desi tato ham upasampādayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:4066: cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma kambalaṃ karpāsaṃ yāvat saṃkakṣikā /
V05bhivin_u:4068: sā taṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇitvā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī na upasampādayed iti svayan na upasampādayet niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4070: eṣā tāva bhikṣuṇī śikṣyamāṇāyā cīvaraṃ gṛhṇāti /
V05bhivin_u:4073: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati jarādurbalā vyādhidurbalā vā anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4074: vaktavyā etasyā mayā cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā imām upasthāpehi /
V05bhivin_u:4075: atha sā necchati taṃ cīvaraṃ pratidātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4077: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī cīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na upasthāpeti na cīvaraṃ pratidadāti niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4080: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamānām evaṃ vaditvā yadi me cīvararaṃ desi tato ham upasaṃpādayiṣyan ti tasyāś cīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇītvā na upasaṃpādayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4084: aparo dāni vāṇijako śatasahasramūlyaṃ kambalaratanam ādāya uttarā pathāto āgato /
V05bhivin_u:4085: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito kim asya mūlyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4088: naiva rājā krīṇāti na rājaputrāḥ na vaṇijāḥ na sārthavāhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4089: so dāni vāṇijako vīthīm abhiruhitvā cintāsāgaram anupraviṣṭo āsati /
V05bhivin_u:4090: imaṃ mahārghaṃ mūlyaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ bahuśulkaṃ na vikrāyati /
V05bhivin_u:4098: gaccha eṣā bhadrā nāma śramaṇikā sā krīṇīṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:4099: so dāni taṃ ceṭakasya skandhe āropayitvā bhikṣuṇī vihāraṃ gatvā pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:4112: sā dāni na paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:4114: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya śatasahasraṃ vīthīkāto dāpehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4126: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4131: tad eva sarvaṃ yāvad ām bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:4133: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4134: tena hi na kṣamati uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4136: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣeṇa guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayati ṅissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4137: uttari catuṣkarṣeṇeti karṣo nāma catvāraḥ purāṇāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4141: tad uttariṃ paraṃ ṣoḍaṣehi purāṇehi cetāpayati niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4143: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayitukāmā bhavati catuṣkarṣamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4144: pratyavaro vā tad uttariṃ na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4145: atha dāni kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti pratigṛhṇāty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4147: kiñcāpi bhikṣur mahārghamūlyaṃ pi jānāpayitvā paribhuñjāty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4149: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari catuṣkarṣamūlyāto guruprāvaraṇaṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4163: so dāni tam ādāya bhikṣuṇīvihāraṃ gato /
V05bhivin_u:4177: sā na svayaṃ paṇeti na paṇāpeti /
V05bhivin_u:4179: gaccha sālohitaṃ jalpāhi imasya pīṭhikāto daśapurāṇasahasrāṇi dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4180: so dāni aparehi pṛcchito vikrītaṃ te bhāṇḍaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4189: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4192: nanu bhadre paścimā pi nāma janatā avalokayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4193: tena hi na kṣamati uttari aḍḍhātiya karṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4194: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:4195: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sūkṣmaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4201: niḥsargika pācattikaṃ yāvat yā puna bhikṣuṇī sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ jānāpayati daśapurāṇamūlyaṃ jānāpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4204: atha dānī kocid ayācito avijñapto mahārghamūlyaṃ pi dadāti śatikam vā sāhasrikam vā yadi kiñcāpi paribhuñjāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4205: kiñcāpi bhikṣu śatasahasramūlyaṃ pi jānāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4207: yā puna bhikṣuṇī uttari aḍḍhātiyakarṣamūlyāto sukhumaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ / uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4219: so dāni kāṣṭhavāham ādāya antarāpaṇam okasto /
V05bhivin_u:4238: so dāni manuṣya paśyati yady ahaṃ dvau kārṣāpaṇā labhāmi mah'argham mayā vikrītaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:4239: so taṃ adhikaritvā kāṣṭhavāhamūlyaṃ gṛhṇiya śakaṭam āruhitvā tasyāpaṇikasyāgratenopayāti /
V05bhivin_u:4257: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocenti yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4258: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen niḥsargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4260: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya ākāravantena darśanena ākāravantena śramaṇena /
V05bhivin_u:4265: etaṃ dāni āpaṇikasya vā prāvarikasya vā kiñcid bhāṇḍam upagatam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4266: tena ca bhikṣuṇī arthīkā bhavati na dāni kṣamati tahiṃ antarāyayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4268: atha khu ekā śca sthitvā pratipālayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4278: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye kiñcid upakreyam bhavati pātram vā cīvaram vā na kṣamati antarā yatituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4280: atha dāni saṃghamadhye vaḍḍho vaḍḍhikāya jānāpayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4281: bhikṣur api paropagataṃ cetāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4283: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī paropagataṃ cetāpayen nissargikapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4295: caturthaṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratigrahaṃ uddharitvā na jātarūpaṃ samodahet /
V05bhivin_u:4301: tatra nirdiṣṭā triṃśad daśa ca anūnāḥ kāraṇe samutpanne naiḥsargika bhagavatā nirdiṣṭā bhikṣuṇīsūtre //
V05bhivin_u:4304: 183. ime kho punar āryemiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4360: yathā yeva bhikṣuṇā tathā yeva kartavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4364: atha bhadrā kāpileyī antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭiṃ prāvaritvā jñātikulaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:4370: sā dāni mārgayati ātmanaḥ saṃghāṭin na paśyati /
V05bhivin_u:4371: tāye dāni bhavati avaśyam āryāya saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
V05bhivin_u:4372: arhati āryā mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4374: gacchatha yūyaṃ āryamiśrikāyo nāhaṃ gacchāmi kim arthaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4382: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4386: sā dāni śabdapitā yāvat satyaṃ bhadreti /
V05bhivin_u:4389: yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:4391: tena hi na kṣamati cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4392: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4394: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4396: peyālaṃ cīvaran ti cīvaraṃ nāma saṃghāṭi yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
V05bhivin_u:4399: na dāni kṣamati antevāsinīye apratisaṃviditā saṃghāṭīṃ prāvarituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4400: atha dāni prāvarati vaktavyā iyam mayā saṃghāṭī prāvaritā /
V05bhivin_u:4401: yadi praviśeṣi mama saṃghāṭīṃ prāvaritvā praviśesi /
V05bhivin_u:4405: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī saṃghāṭiṃ dhoveti vā sīveti vā rañjeti vā /
V05bhivin_u:4406: yadi pratibalā bhavati tasyā api saṃvibhāgaṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4408: tiṣṭha tvaṃ iheva ahan tava piṇḍapātasaṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:4412: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cīvarasaṃkramaṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4420: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgarasyānāgariyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4421: gartodarapitā gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodaro tīrthikehi /
V05bhivin_u:4422: so dāni hastakambalena prāvṛto śītena khaṇakhaṇāyanto dantavīṇikāṃ vādayanto vihāram āgato /
V05bhivin_u:4428: tāya tasya uttarāsaṅgo surabho suphoṣito dinno prāvaraṇāya /
V05bhivin_u:4429: so dāni prāvaritvā pānāgāraṃ gatvā pibanto āsati /
V05bhivin_u:4430: jano dani ojjhāyati kim eṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭikānāṃ vinipatitānāṃ yānagardabhānāṃ surābhraṣṭānāṃ ṛṣidhvajanena dinnena bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4431: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4440: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4441: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4443: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ pramāṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4450: na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4451: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī bhavati kṛtapuṇyā striyo dāni maṅgalārthāya dārakasya dārikāye vā kāṣāya khaṇḍaṃ yācanti /
V05bhivin_u:4452: na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ kalpiyakārikāya dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4453: bhikṣur api āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4454: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ kṛtapuṇyo bhavati yāvat kalpiyakārakeṇa dātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4458: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ śramaṇacīvaraṃ dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4466: tena hi na kṣamati kumārīnivastena antaragṛhaṃ praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4468: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni yathāgatān paṭān navān tantrodgatān puṣpadaśān antaravāsaṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4471: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4473: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇiko kārāpayitavyo tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ dīrghaso catvāri vitastiyo /
V05bhivin_u:4475: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4478: bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīyeti svayaṃ vā kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:4481: sugatavitastinā ti tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvyardho mañcakapādo tad uttarim kārāpayed iti paraṃ pramāṇato cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4483: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī dīrghaśo karoti prāmāṇikaṃ tiryak karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4486: evaṃ tiryak karoti prāmāṇikaṃ dīrghaśo karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4487: ante karoti prāmāṇikaṃ madhye karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4488: madhye karoti prāmāṇikaṃ ante karoti atirekaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4489: dviguṇaṃ māpeti udakena saṃkucati saṃkucitaṃ māpeti udakena phoṣeti śuṣkaṃ vaḍḍhiṣyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4491: antarvāsaṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4494: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4499: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4501: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikāya kīdṛśaṃ cīvaram utkṣiptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4502: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4507: bhikṣuṇīyo tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4508: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati tathāgatān paṭān puṣpadaśān saṃkakṣikāṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4512: saṃkakṣikāṃ bhikṣuṇīya kārāpayantīya prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4519: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī sarpiṇikāṃ nadīṃ snānāya gatā /
V05bhivin_u:4521: pañca licchavikumārāḥ tāye pratibaddhacittāḥ nadītīre sthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4523: sā dān āha dīrghāyuḥ gacchatha gacchatha yāvad aham uttarāmi /
V05bhivin_u:4528: dirghāyuḥ kim anena pūtikāyena navadvāreṇāśucipragharantena dṛṣṭena /
V05bhivin_u:4533: te dāni yadā na gacchanti cirañ ca bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4534: sā dāni andho bālajano ti kṛtvā ekaṃ hastam agrato kṛtvā aparaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā uttīrṇā /
V05bhivin_u:4535: te tāṃ vivasanāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4541: paśya bhagavan katham iya pañca licchavikumārāḥ pratibaddhacittāḥ bhadrāyāṃ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4543: naitarhi yeva ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ mūrcchitāḥ patitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4544: anyadāpy ete bhadrāyāṃ pratibaddhacittāḥ anyadāpi bhagavan anyadāpi bhikṣuṇīyo /
V05bhivin_u:4545: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ yāvat triṃśabhavane /
V05bhivin_u:4546: anyatarasmiṃ bhavane bharaṇī nāma apsarā upapannā /
V05bhivin_u:4547: prāsādikā darśanīyā atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate /
V05bhivin_u:4548: atirivānyāsām apsarāṇāṃ abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virājate /
V05bhivin_u:4556: na tāvad eṣā śakyā asmābhiḥ pañcadhā kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4558: yo 'tra sarvasuṣṭhu adhyavasito bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:4560: utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā āsane na labhate sukhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4561: śayito ca sukhaṃ labhe yadā kāmā jahanti mā // [1] //
V05bhivin_u:4563: sukhaṃ tvam asi devendra yaṃ supto labhase sukhaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4564: bheryā saṃgrāmaśīrṣe vā sadā kāmā hananti māṃ // [2] //
V05bhivin_u:4566: bheryās tu hanyamānāyā bhaved vīcī muhur muhuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4567: kāṣṭhasrotā upapannaṃ vā sadā kāmā hananti me // [3] //
V05bhivin_u:4572: sarve bhavanto sukhitā yeṣāṃ gāthā pratibhānti /
V05bhivin_u:4573: ahaṃ khalu na jānāmi kiṃ jīvāmi marāmi vā // [5] //
V05bhivin_u:4575: tvaṃ suṣṭhu adhyavasito tathaiva eṣā bharaṇī /
V05bhivin_u:4578: syād vo bhikṣuṇiyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā bharaṇī nāma apsarā abhūṣi /
V05bhivin_u:4581: anye te devaputrāḥ etad eva te pañca licchavikumārāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4585: kasya bhagavan karmaṇo vipākena bhadrā prāsādikā darśanīyā mahākulīnā maheśākhyā mahābhogā kṣiprādhigamā ca /
V05bhivin_u:4586: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrāṃ kāpileyīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4587: pratibhātu te bhadre bhikṣuṇīnām ātmopanāyikāṃ pūrvenivāsapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4588: atha khalu bhadrā anekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmarantī bhikṣuṇīyo āmantreti /
V05bhivin_u:4589: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyaḥ atītam adhvānaṃ nagaraṃ vārāṇasī kāśījanapado /
V05bhivin_u:4591: sā dāni anyatarāya śreṣṭhibhāryāya śabdāpitā keśān prasādhanāya /
V05bhivin_u:4594: atha śuṇṭhīka nāma pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātāya caranto tasmin gṛhe piṇḍāya praviṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:4597: sā dāni strī tāṃ śreṣṭhibhāryāṃ āha /
V05bhivin_u:4600: kā imasyaivaṃ durvarṇasya alpeśākhyasya bhikṣān dāsyati /
V05bhivin_u:4606: āryadhīte dehi me yan mamādyabhaktaṃ tvayā dātavyam tam aham imasya dadāmi /
V05bhivin_u:4608: yan tavādyabhaktaṃ prāpuṇati taṃ gṛhītvā udake prakṣipāhi etasya vā dehīti /
V05bhivin_u:4610: hastasyaivaṃ kṛtvā prasādena tasya pratyekabuddhasya dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4611: sa pratyekabuddhas vata eva vaihāyase prakrāntaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4612: sā dāni dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:4613: śreṣṭhinā ca dṛṣṭo gṛhāto ṛṣī vaihāyasena prakrānto /
V05bhivin_u:4622: imāya daridrastriyāya dattaṃ śreṣṭhī utkaṇṭhito īdṛśo dakṣiṇīyo mama gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo na ca saṃmānito /
V05bhivin_u:4623: so dāni śreṣṭhī tāṃ striyam āha /
V05bhivin_u:4624: dehi me etaṃ puṇyaṃ yaṃ tvayā adya sañcitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4625: dadāmi te prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ / sā dān āha / sā dān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4626: kṣīyati sarvaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ ca /
V05bhivin_u:4627: na kṣīyante puṇyephalaṃ dattaṃ munīnāṃ sarvathā / [7] //
V05bhivin_u:4628: yad aham evaṃ daridrā para vaktavyā anyathā /
V05bhivin_u:4630: durvarṇatāya mucye haṃ avaikalyatā ca bhogehi /
V05bhivin_u:4632: evaṃ caṅkrameyaṃ na bhe yathā caṅkramase vīra /
V05bhivin_u:4635: bhavāmi muditā [ḥ ḥ] dattvā ṛṣisya āhāraṃ / [11] //
V05bhivin_u:4642: syād vo bhaginyaḥ anyā sā daridrā strī naitad evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4644: yaṃ so mayā pratyekabuddho piṇḍapātena pratimānito prasannacittāya tasya karmaṇo vipākenāhaṃ prāsādikā /
V05bhivin_u:4646: api tu bhaginyaḥ naitad evaṃ mayā kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ yenāhaṃ prāsādikā darśanīyā /
V05bhivin_u:4649_0: 189. bhūtapūrvaṃ bhaginyo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasīyaṃ nagare kāyaci striyāya lohacakraṃ
V05bhivin_u:4649_1: paṭalake kṛtvā puṣpehi okiritvā kāśikena vastreṇa praticchādeyitvā bhagavato kāśyapasya dattaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4651: rathasya cakraṃ sanābhinemikaṃ vastrottamena praticchādayitvā ye munivarasākṣikṛtā hi dharmā aham api taṃ sākṣikaromi dharmaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4652: sā dāni kenacit kāryeṇa aparādhinī svāminā avasāditā /
V05bhivin_u:4659: tatra ca nātidūre bhagavato kāśyapasya stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātā /
V05bhivin_u:4663: sā prasannacittā tāni alaṅkārāṇi muñcitvā stūpe avakiritvā kāśikena vastreṇācchādayitvā candanenānulimpitvā praṇidhānaṃ akārṣīt /
V05bhivin_u:4665: sa ca me dharman deśeya tasyāhaṃ dharman deśitam ājāneyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:4668: apsarasahasraparivṛtā sā tahiṃ yāvadāyuḥ sthitvā tataś cyavitvā manuṣyeṣūpapannāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4670: tāye dāni jñātikehi bhadreti nāma kṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4671: anarthikā kāmaguṇehi pañcahi yā niṣkramitvā pravrajitā sarvāsravakṣayam akārṣīt /
V05bhivin_u:4672: kāśikāni vastrāṇi pratyagraṃ cānulepanaṃ bhagavato kāśyapasya yā prasannābhiropayet /
V05bhivin_u:4673: sā kāpileyī bhagavato pādāṃ vandati śāstuno /
V05bhivin_u:4677: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ bhadrā sthaviramahākāśyapena sārdhaṃ pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:4679: na etarhi yeva ete ubhaye pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:4682: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo atītam adhvānaṃ catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ kumbhakārakule vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4684: nimī rājā videhānāṃ ugrasenaś ca kṣatriyaḥ // [13] //
V05bhivin_u:4685: ete catvāro rājaṛṣayaḥ ugratejā mahābalā kumbhakārakule vāsa ekarātram upāgamat /
V05bhivin_u:4687: kiṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā vā pravrajyām ārocatha /
V05bhivin_u:4692: śabda dvitīyā tu samāgatā yato ramāgatā yato
V05bhivin_u:4718: ayam eva kālo nahi anyad asti /
V05bhivin_u:4722: āmaṃ pakvan na jānanti atha loṇam aloṇakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4727: nimī rājā bodhisattvaḥ kaliṅga pi śārisutaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4728: ugrasenaś ca maudgalyo ānando āsi bhārgavo /
V05bhivin_u:4729: kumbhakāraḥ kāśyapo āsi bhadrā sā kumbhakārikā // [26] //
V05bhivin_u:4733: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni tathāgatān paṭān dakaśāṭikāṃ kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:4735: tena hi na kṣamati yathāgataṃ paṭaṃ dakaśāṭikāṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4741: tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye cchedanapācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4742: dakaśāṭikā ti yā sā bhagavatā anujñātā /
V05bhivin_u:4743: kārāpayantīye ti svayaṃ kuryāt pareṇa vā kārāpaye /
V05bhivin_u:4744: prāmāṇikan ti tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ catvāri vitastiyo /
V05bhivin_u:4745: sugatavitastinā ti sugato nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho tasya yo vitasti so dvy ardho mañcakapādo tiryag dve tad uttariṃ kārāpaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4746: atha dāni ekānte nikuñje pradeśe snāyanti vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4747: bhikṣur api vinā dakaśāṭikāya snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4748: atha nikuñjapradeśe snāyati vinā dakaśāṭikāya anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4760: śakyasi ārye saṃghasya kṛtena paṭān yācituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4776: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:4777: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4780: cīvarapratyāśāyeti cīvaraṃ nāma kālaṃ yāvat kṣaumunikā /
V05bhivin_u:4782: vyatināmayed iti atikrāmayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4787: atha khalu ye pratibalāḥ pitā putrā vā bhrātarau vā bhaginīyo vā jñātisambandhā vā gotrasambandhā vā te yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4789: atha dān āhaṃsuḥ jñāsyāma jñāsyāma iti vaktavyā /
V05bhivin_u:4791: atha dāni apratibalā bhavati utsāhayitavyā sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃghasya kaṭhinavivarārthāya /
V05bhivin_u:4792: utsahayitvā naiva yācati naiva yāvayeti na bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyārocayati na labhyatīti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4794: bhikṣur api durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4796: yā puna bhikṣuṇī durbalāya cīvarapratyāśāya saṃghasya kaṭhināstāraṃ vyatināmayet pācattikaṃ / phu //
V05bhivin_u:4800: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo sāntararottareṇa prāvṛtā bhagavato pādavandikā āgatā tāsāṃ nirgatānāṃ agnidāha utpannaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4802: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4806: etaṃ va ta dāni yūyaṃ pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharatha /
V05bhivin_u:4810: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo ca mallakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca sukumārapravrajitā ca /
V05bhivin_u:4812: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4816: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4819: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4821: pārihārikaṃ cīvaran ti saṃghāṭī yāvat dakaśāṭikā /
V05bhivin_u:4823: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ padaṃ bhagavatā anāpattiḥ gilānāya /
V05bhivin_u:4824: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4825: atha dāni cetiyaṃ vandati caṅkramati vā anto sīmam vā gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4826: bhikṣur api pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4828: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā pārihārikaṃ cīvaraṃ na pariharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4832: bhadrāye dāni kāpileyīye jñātikulāto devasikaṃ bhaktam ānīyati /
V05bhivin_u:4845: asmākaṃ gṛhe na evaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ pacyati /
V05bhivin_u:4850: te dāni gṛhaṃ gatvā tā dāsīyo daṇḍakaśāhatāyo kṛtāyo /
V05bhivin_u:4851: itikitikāye dhītaro evam ettakam upakaraṇaṃ dadāmo yūyam asphātikaṃ karotha /
V05bhivin_u:4859: tena hi na kṣamati parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā pacitum vā pacāyitum vā bhṛjjitum vā bhṛjjāpayitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:4862: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo ca kolitakanyāyo ca piṇḍāya carantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:4869: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4871: yāvat labhyaṃ bhagavan bhikṣuṇīya tūṣṇīṃ kṛtvā bhoktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4873: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:4875_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyam vā puno puno pacitvā vā pacāpetvā
V05bhivin_u:4875_1: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpetvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpetvā vā agilānā khādaye vā bhuñjeya vā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4878: parāhṛtan ti grāmato vā ānītaṃ nagarato vā ānītaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4879: khādanīyan ti khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyan ti bhojanīyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4886: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:4888: jarādurbalā vā bhoti vyādhidurbalā vā bhuktvā vā vamati /
V05bhivin_u:4889: aphāsuṃ vā bhoti idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4890: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rasagṛdhyā parāhṛtaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ puno puno paceya vā pacāpeya vā pācāttikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4891: atha dāni śītalam bhavati labhyā uṣṇīkartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4892: na dāni thālikāya vā piṭharikāya vā /
V05bhivin_u:4893: atha khalu tāmrapātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kāṃsikāya vā uṣṇīkartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4894: bhikṣur api svayaṃ pacati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4896: atha dāni śītalo bhavati piṇḍapāto uṣṇīkaroti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4898_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī parāhṛtaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam va puno pacitvā vā pacāpetva
V05bhivin_u:4898_1: vā bhṛjjitvā vā bhṛjjāpayitvā vā kaṭhitvā vā kaṭhāpayitvā vā agilānā khādeya vā bhuñjeya
V05bhivin_u:4902: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4903: gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca śākyehi pravrajitā gartodara tirthakeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:4904: gatodarapitā bhuñjati gartodaramātā vījayantī agrato tiṣṭhati pānīyamallakaṃ dhāreti /
V05bhivin_u:4905: so dāni tāye kānicit kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:4914: agrapariṣā eṣā na labhyā evaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4916: ayaṃ khalu akhalla akuśalo aprakṛtijño adyāpi yāni tāni ajalpitavyāni jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:4917: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4921: evaṃ ca dāni bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthihasi /
V05bhivin_u:4922: tena hi na kṣamati dakavījanena upasthihituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4924: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4929: bhuñjantaṃ ti pañcajātakam vā pañcajātakasaṃsṛṣtam vā yad vā kiñcit khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4933: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakamallakan dhārayati nīvījanaṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4934: vījayati na udakamallakan dhāreti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:4937: sā eṣā āpattiḥ ekasya bhikṣusya ekabhikṣuṇīye /
V05bhivin_u:4938: atha dāni saṃbahulā bhikṣū bhavanti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4939: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye pitā vā bhrātā vā bhikṣur bhavati kiñcāpi vījayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4941: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ bhuñjantaṃ dakavījanena upasthiheya pācattikaṃ // 0 //
V05bhivin_u:4947: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo khādanti pi mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:4948: so dāni kadācit vāṭaṃ pratyavekṣituṅ gataḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4949: tena dāni so dṛṣṭo vāṭo vidhvasto /
V05bhivin_u:4953: laśunena tāyo dāni khādanti mardenti pi ujjhenti pi viśrāṇenti pi ādāya pi gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:4958: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4960: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:4961: laśunan ti laśunaṃ nāma jātimaṃ sevimaṃ nāgaraṃ kaccharuhaṃ pārvateyaṃ brahmadeyaṃ āvarantakaṃ māgadhakaṃ kosalakaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4962: yaṃ cā punar anya pi kiñcil laśunaṃ sarvaṃ laśunaṃ na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4963: āman na kṣamati pakvan na kṣamati /
V05bhivin_u:4966: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīya gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati labhyan taṃ mrakṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4967: mrakṣayitvā na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4968: atha khu pratigupte pradeśe sthātavyaṃ yāvad varttā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:4971: yā puna bhikṣuṇī laśunaṃ khādeya pācattikaṃ // 1 //
V05bhivin_u:4985: sā dāni tāsāṃ bhāgineyakānāṃ nānāprakāraṃ khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ bhakṣayitvā deti /
V05bhivin_u:4987: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā śraddhādeyaṃ gṛhiṇān dadāti /
V05bhivin_u:4988: etam prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:4991: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:4995: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:4997: gartodaro ca gartodarapitā ca gartodaramātā ca agārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitā /
V05bhivin_u:5000: yāvat sa gartodaramātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrānto tāya gartodaramātāya tasya nānāprakārasya khajjakasya pūraṃ pātraṃ dinnaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5001: so dāni taṃ gṛhya pānāgāraṃ gatvā ātmanā ca khādati pārāṃś ca chandeti /
V05bhivin_u:5015: tena hi na kṣamati āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5018: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5029: yadi tāvad asya kiñcid dātuṃ bhavati na kṣamati svahastaṃ dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5031: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5040: atha dāni pravrajitako āgacchati na kṣamati svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5042: atha dāni kalpiyakārī na bhavati ato yeva gṛhṇīya khādāhīti /
V05bhivin_u:5044: sālohite kim asmākaṃ caṇḍālehi viya pravartasi /
V05bhivin_u:5047: atha dāni grāmāntaraṃ gacchati labhyan tena kalpiyakṛtyaṃ kārāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5048: ato ātmā ca khādatha asmākañ ca pratigrāhatha /
V05bhivin_u:5052: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikasya vā parivrājakasya vā svahastaṃ khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5058: sā dāni rājakulehi amātyakulehi āpaṇikakulehi śreṣṭhikulehi strīṇāṃ bastiṃ sthapeti /
V05bhivin_u:5060: añjanaṃ pratyañjanaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ svedakarma nastakarma śastrakarma bhaiṣajyām anuprayacchati /
V05bhivin_u:5061: sā upasarpaṇaṃ bhavati khajjaṃ bhojjaṃ labhati /
V05bhivin_u:5064: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5073: tena hi na kṣamati cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5076: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5077: cikitsitavidyā nāma ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5082: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5084: yā puna bhikṣuṇī cikitsitavidyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5094: na kṣamati cikitsituṃ bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5095: api tu eṣa detha mama kiñcid vāciṣyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5096: sā āgārikāṃś ca parivrājakāṃś ca cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati /
V05bhivin_u:5100: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5105: cikitsitavidyām iti ahividyā viṣavidyā yāvad grahacaritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5108: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5110: bhikṣur api cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayati vinayātikramam āsādyati /
V05bhivin_u:5112: yā puna bhikṣuṇī āgārikam vā parivrājakam vā cikitsitavidyāṃ vācayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5116: viśākhāya dāni mṛgāramātāya ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito /
V05bhivin_u:5117: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalyato yevāgatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5118: upāsike yaṃ dāni tvayā ubhayato saṃgho bhaktenopanimantrito kin dāni vayam upāsikāya upakāraṃ karoma /
V05bhivin_u:5124: evam etad api tu upakāraṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5125: tāyo dāni talakam abhiruhitvā karpāsaṃ gṛhītvā anyāhi cikitsitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5133: naiṣa mama upakāro yaṃ mamāryamiśrikā piñjeyur vā loḍheyur vā vikaḍḍheyur vā karteyur vā /
V05bhivin_u:5134: eṣo mamopakāro yam āryamiśrikā matsakāśād bhuktvā uddiśatha svādhyāyetha yāvad buddhānāṃ śāsane yogam āpadyetha /
V05bhivin_u:5135: yat tāya upāsikāya avadhyāpitaṃ taṃ dāni bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5136: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5140: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kartuṃ / yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:5141: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5144: vaiyāpṛtyam iti karteya vā piñjeya vā yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:5145: ohaneya vā pīṣeya vā paceya vā sīveya vā /
V05bhivin_u:5146: yā punar anya pi kiñcid gṛhivaiyāpṛtyam kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5152: āryamiśrikāhi sāhāyyaṃ kartavyam iti kiñcāpi gandham vā pīṣayati /
V05bhivin_u:5154: bhikṣur api gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5156: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhivaiyāpṛtyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ // 4 //
V05bhivin_u:5160: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī madhyāhne vighane aparaṃ kulam upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:5161: tahin dāni dve bhāryāpatikā kleṣotpīḍitā raho saṃjñino maithunaṃ pratiṣetukāmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5162: sā dāni apratisaṃviditā sahasā tahiṃ praviṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:5163: so dāni manuṣyo uddhāvito utkaṇṭhito karmaṇy enāṃ rājā tena parivāteti /
V05bhivin_u:5164: imān tāvad itikitikāya dhītāṃ śramaṇikāṃ viṭṭālayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:5167: manāsmi āryamiśrikāyo brahmacaryāto cyāvitā yāvad etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5170: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī sambhojanīyaṃ kulan divā pūrve apratisaṃvicitā upasaṃkrāmasi /
V05bhivin_u:5171: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5174: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulaṃ divā pūrve apratisaṃviditā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5176: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:5178: yahiṃ strīpuruṣakaṃ sthālīpiṭharakaṃ kaṇṭikāmusalakaṃ sūpellakaṃ yavaprasthakaṃ imaṃ paścimakaṃ kulaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5179: sambhojanīyan ti strī puruṣasya bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5180: yadi vigate madhyāhne pūrve apratisaṃviditā ti aśabdakarṇikāya /
V05bhivin_u:5181: anāhūtā upasaṃkrameyā ti praviśet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5182: yaṃ dāni jñāyate etaṃ saṃbhojanīyaṃ kulan ti nahi kṣamati tahiṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditaṃ anāhūtāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5189: yadi praviśitvā na niṣkrāmati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5190: atha dāni tuṇutuṇā śabdo bhavati acchaṭikā dātavyā utkāśitavyaṃ vā /
V05bhivin_u:5191: yadi tāva tūṣṇīkā bhavati na kṣamati praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5192: atha dāni pratyudgacchanti svāgatam āryāyeti praviśeti praveṣṭavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5193: bhikṣur api saṃvidito upasamkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5195: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule divā upasaṃkrameya pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5199: yā dāni sā kālīyan triyantarā licchavidhītā pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:5200: sā dāni āgārikehi ca prāvrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:5201: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5204: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5206: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā saṃsṛṣṭā vihareya divasaṃ vā muhūrtaṃ vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇoddeśehi pācattikam //
V05bhivin_u:5213: saṃsṛṣṭā vihared iti kāyikena saṃsargeṇa vācikena saṃsargeṇa /
V05bhivin_u:5215: divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato tatkṣaṇantallavaṃ tanmuhūrtam vā antamasato /
V05bhivin_u:5218: śramaṇ'uddeśā iti pañcadaśavarṣān upādāya yāvat saptatikāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5219: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ārāmikehi vā parivrājakehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā viharati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5220: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīyo anyamanyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharanti viharanty abhiratā vivecayitavyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5222: trir api bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5224: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ārāmikair vā parivrājikair vā sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharet divasam vā muhūrtam vā antamasato ārāmikaśramaṇ'uddeśakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pācattikaṃ // 6 //
V05bhivin_u:5228: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:5229: sā dāni yādā parājītā bhavati tadā upasampati /
V05bhivin_u:5245: yā pi bhadrāyaṇī mām evam āha sā py evam bhavatu /
V05bhivin_u:5246: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5251: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:5252: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī viharet ātmānaṃ sandhāya parām vā sandhāya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5258: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ sandhāya param vā upaśapati pācattikam /
V05bhivin_u:5261: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upaśapantī vihared ātmānaṃ vā sandhāya paraṃ vā pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5265: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoti /
V05bhivin_u:5266: sā yadā parājitā bhavati tadā ātmānaṃ khaṭacapeṭamustakehi piṭṭāyati /
V05bhivin_u:5269: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5271: satyaṃ tvaṃ nande evaṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīhi sārdhaṃ kalahaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5276: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande naiṣa dharmo yāvat tena hi na kṣamati ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5277: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5278: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5281: ātmānaṃ hanitvā ti khaṭehi vā pāṣāṇehi vā yāvad anyena vā kenacit /
V05bhivin_u:5282: rodeyā ti aśruṇi vā pravartayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5284: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanti na rodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5286: hanati ca rodati ca pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5288: bhikṣur api ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5290: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ātmānaṃ hanitvā rodeya pācattikaṃ // 8 //
V05bhivin_u:5294: sthūlanandāya dāni bhikṣūṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī kulehi saṃvarṇitā /
V05bhivin_u:5295_0: sā jetā bhikṣuṇī bhadrikā kulāny upasaṃkramati prāsādikenātikrāntena pratikrāntenāvalokitena
V05bhivin_u:5295_1: vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena prasāritena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena anuddhatā anunnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:5300_0: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī anākalpasampannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
V05bhivin_u:5300_1: pāṭitavipaṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:5301: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5303: paśyatha āryamiśrikāyo mamaivāryā jetā kulehi saṃvarṇitā mahy'evāvarṇaṃ bravīti /
V05bhivin_u:5307: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5311: yāvad eva nāma tvaṃ duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5312: tena hi na kṣamati duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5313: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5315: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣūṇīnām evaṃ vadeya /
V05bhivin_u:5317: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5319_0: bhikṣuṇīnāṃ evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī yāvad āham ārye amukaṃ kulan
V05bhivin_u:5319_1: ti kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ kulan nāma kṣatriyakulaṃ brāhmaṇakulaṃ rājanyakulaṃ yāni
V05bhivin_u:5320: tato itthannāmāye ti yathā jetā pi bhikṣuṇīye /
V05bhivin_u:5321: bhagavaty āghāta iti na ca āghātavastūni asthānaprakopadaśamāni /
V05bhivin_u:5322: apratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāriteneti na ākāravantena darśanena na ākāravantena śramaṇena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeyā ti avadhyāpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5323: yāvat prajñaptiḥ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5325: bhikṣur api duḥśrutena dur avadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5327: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnām evam vadeya yadāham ārye amukaṃ kulaṃ upasamkramāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5328: tato itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye bhagavaty āghāto 'pratyaya iti duḥśrutena duravadhāritena kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ // 9 //
V05bhivin_u:5332: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya mahātmehi kulehi dvārakoṣṭhakehi tiṣṭhati /
V05bhivin_u:5334: praviśantu āryāḥ praviśantu āryamiśrāḥ asmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
V05bhivin_u:5335: agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā yuṣmākaṃ prathamānām eva paścād ātmanā paribhuñjiṣyan ti /
