V05bhivin_u:5343: surābhrastā yānā gardabhāḥ nagnāḥ ahrīkāḥ anotrāpiṇo mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ vinipatitāḥ praviśatha yuṣmākaṃ kṛtena sidhyati /
V05bhivin_u:5344: yuṣmākam agrapiṇḍan tāvad dattvā prathamānām eva paścād ātmānaṃ paribhokṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:5349: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5358: duṣkṛtan te nande yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5359: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ karoṣi /
V05bhivin_u:5360: tena hi na kṣamati kulamātsaryaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5361: atha khalu bhagavān māhāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5364: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5366: kulamātsaryan ti āvaraṇaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5369: yadi tāvad bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā pṛcchati bhūto guṇo vaktavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5370: atha dāni anyatīrthikā pṛcchanti mā ete mithyādṛṣṭiṃ grāhayiṣyantīti bhṛkuṭiṃ karoti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5371: bhikṣur api kulamātsaryaṃ karoti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5373: yā puna bhikṣuṇī kulamātsaryaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ / ḷṃ // uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5383: gartodaro ca gartodaramātā ca gartodarapitā ca āgārasyānagāriyaṃ pravrajitāh /
V05bhivin_u:5387: so dāni tāye kānicit pūrvacaritāni jalpati strīutsadadauṣṭhulyāni yāni tasyā amanaāpāni /
V05bhivin_u:5393: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5399: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ paribhāṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5401: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośayed roṣayed paribhāṣayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5404: ākrośayed iti akāraśakāraekāraiḥ roṣayet paribhāṣayet caṇḍālu /
V05bhivin_u:5406: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣuṃ sammukham ākrośituṃ roṣituṃ paribhāṣitum /
V05bhivin_u:5408: atha bhikṣuṇyā pitā vā bhrātā jñātiko vā pravrajitako bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:5409: so ca bhavati uddhato unnaḍo asamāhito labhyā dāni so vaktuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5413: sālohita idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā tvaṃ śikṣiṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5416: idānīṃ tvaṃ na śikṣasi kadā śikṣiṣyasi yadā maṇḍaladvāram anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi /
V05bhivin_u:5417: bhikṣuṇāpi bhikṣuṇīyo na kṣamati sammukham ākrośituṃ muṇḍastrī veśyastrī ti /
V05bhivin_u:5419: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṃ samukham ākrośati pācattikaṃ //1 //
V05bhivin_u:5423: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni ekavarṣā dvivarṣā yāvat ṣaṭvarṣā upasthāpenti /
V05bhivin_u:5425: tā indragavā iva vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
V05bhivin_u:5426: anākalpasampannā anīryapathasampannā na jānanti katham upādhyāyinīye pratipattavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5433: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5438: etad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:5441: tena hi na kṣamati ūnadvādaśodakavarṣāya upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5442: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5443: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5444: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5446: ūnadvādaśavarṣā ti ūnadvādaśavarṣā nāma ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo ūnadvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5448: ūnadvādaśodakavarṣo atireko dvādaśo samvatsaro ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5455: akṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi upasampādeti ūnadvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5459: hemante upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5461: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā kṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyām upasampādeti pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5462: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ upasampannā tena dvādaśamena upasampādeti kṛtāhi dvihi pravāraṇāhi pūradvādaśavarṣā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:5464: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5465: bhikṣur api ūnadvādaśavarṣo upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5467: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:5473: tena dāni kālena tena samayena ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:5478: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5481: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:5484: tena hi na kṣamati anaṅgopetāya upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5485: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5487: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5489: sā ca anaṅgopetā iti aṅgopetā nāma yasyā daśāṅgāni samvidyante saṃyathaīdaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5502: pratibalā bhavaty āpattim āpannāṃ vyutthāpayitum vā vyutthāpāyayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5504: pratibalā bhavaty āpadāsu vyupakarṣayituṃ vā vyupakarṣāpayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5506: pratibalā bhavati gilānam upasthihitum vā upasthāpayitum vā //
V05bhivin_u:5509: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni samvidyante iyam ucyate aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:5514: sā eṣā anaṅgopetā pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5516: bhikṣur api anaṅgopeto pravrājayati upasampādayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5518: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati sā ca anaṅgopetā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ // 3 //
V05bhivin_u:5524: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetāyo upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5526: asty eṣā dvādaśavarṣā na punar jñāyate /
V05bhivin_u:5528: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5533: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā bhikṣunī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:5535: yaciṣyati āryamiśrikā itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī dvādaśavarṣā aṅgopetā upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5536: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etan dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5541: sādhu bata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutin detu /
V05bhivin_u:5546: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5551: tāye saṃgho itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsaṃmutin deti /
V05bhivin_u:5552: yāsām āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammutin dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5557: dinnā aryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśavarṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanāsammuti saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5558: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5559: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5560: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetā sā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5561: aṅgopetā iti daśabhir aṅgehi bhikṣuṇī aṅgopetā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:5564: anaṅgopetā ca asammatā tam ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ evam eṣā asammatā /
V05bhivin_u:5566: sā eṣa bhikṣuṇī asammatā upasthāpayati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5569: pūra dvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati aṅgopetāsā ca asammatā upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //4 //
V05bhivin_u:5573: yā sā kālīya bhikṣuṇīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā pravrājitā /
V05bhivin_u:5575: pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca paravihārān udghāṭiya āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca saha tiṣthati /
V05bhivin_u:5578: kim imāya duḥśīlāya pratitālakinīya puruṣasahāyikāya upasthāpitāya /
V05bhivin_u:5579: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5582: bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:5585: naiṣa kāli dharmo yāvad eva nāmā tvaṃ duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:5586: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5587: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5588: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśīlāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5590: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:5592: pratitālakinīti pratitālakehi pratikuñcikāhi ca anyātakān vihārakān udghāṭayati /
V05bhivin_u:5594: āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:5595: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ yā dāni eṣā āgārikehi parivrājakehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati sā na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5596: atha dāni śaknoti brahmacaryaṃ saṃpādayituṃ labhyā tato saṃsargāto vivecayitvā upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5597: bhikṣur api jānan duḥśīlaṃ śrāmaṇeraṃ strīsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ apratyosārāyetvā upasampādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5599: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī duḥśilāṃ pratitālakinīṃ puruṣasahāyikām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //5 //
V05bhivin_u:5605: na jānanti katham upādhyāyīye pratipadyitavyaṃ yāvat saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipadyitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5606: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5610: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:5612: tena hi na kṣamati ūnaviṃativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5613: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5614: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācatikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5615: ūnaviṃśativarṣā ti ūnaviṃśodakavarṣo ūnaviṃśo samvatsaro ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5618: hemante jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti akṛtāyāṃ pravāraṇāyāṃ ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5620: evaṃ purimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti ūnaviṃśativarṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5621: paścimikāyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ jātā tena viṃśena upasaṃpādeti /
V05bhivin_u:5624: kumārībhūtām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5626: tām etām ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ eka ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti ekā pūrasamjñinīyo /
V05bhivin_u:5627: yā ūnasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti tāyo pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5630: ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasamjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5632: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvāyo ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvā vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5634: pūraviṃśativarṣām ekā ūnaviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo ekā pūraviṃśativarṣasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti /
V05bhivin_u:5638: pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ sarvā pūrasaṃjñinīyo upasampādenti sarvāsām anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5644: yā eṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasampadaṃ sā dāni samanugrahitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5648: atha dāni te pi na jānanti pṛcchitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5653: na uddhikasya vā citrikasya vā vaśena gantavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5656: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //6 //
V05bhivin_u:5661: na kṣamati ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5662: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūraviṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtām adeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5664: ko jānāti pūraviṃśativarṣā vā eṣā na vā ti /
V05bhivin_u:5665: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5670: tāya saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5673: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5674: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
V05bhivin_u:5675: yāciṣyati āryamiśrikā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā dvevarṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ saṃghaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5676: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5679: aham itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5681: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho dve varṣāṇi śikṣāpadāni sammutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:5684: iyam itthannamā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5685: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:5686: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5689: iyam itthannāmā aṣṭādaśavarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5690: sā saṃghaṃ dve varṣāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ yācati /
V05bhivin_u:5691: tasyāḥ saṃgho itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varsāṇī śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ deti /
V05bhivin_u:5692: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5697: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye aṣṭādaśavarṣāye kumārībhūtāye dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutiḥ samghena /
V05bhivin_u:5698: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5699: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmāntrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5700: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5709: taṃ ca se karma kurvanti jñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5721: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na jñāyate paripūraśikṣā vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5722: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5724: tena hi na kṣamati deśitaśikṣām api aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5725: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5727: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā tāṃ cāparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5729: deśitaśikṣā tañ ca se karma kurvanti /
V05bhivin_u:5730: jñaptisampannaṃ gaṇasampannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāsampannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena anupakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5732: aparipūraśikṣā ti aṣṭādaśahi varttehi dve varṣāṇi aśikṣitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5733: katamehi aṣṭādaśahi sarvabhikṣuṇīnāṃ navikety ādi pūrvavat yathā gurudharmeṣu /
V05bhivin_u:5734: na ca tāye kṣamati ekākinīya grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5735: atha khu bhikṣuṇīya vā śramaṇerīya vā saha piṇḍāya praviśitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5737: yadi sā aṣṭānām anyatarānyarāpattim āpadyati punaḥ śikṣā deśitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5738: ekānnaviṃśatim ārabhya sarvaṃ duṣkṛtena kārāpayitavyā yāni ūnakāni dve varṣāṇi śikṣati sāparipūraśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5748: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo viṃśativarṣāṃ kumārībhūtāṃ deṣitaśikṣāṃ paripūraśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5751: no tu jānāma paripūraśikṣā vā na vā ti /
V05bhivin_u:5752: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5755: tena hi yā eṣā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ tāya saṃgho upathāpanāsammutiṃ yācitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5757: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5758: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ yāceyyā /
V05bhivin_u:5759: yāciṣyati āryā saṃgho iyam itthannāmā saṃghaṃ upasthāpanāsammutiṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5760: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5763: aham itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā desitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣāmi tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5765: sādhu vata me āryā saṃgho upasthāpanāsammutiṃ detu /
V05bhivin_u:5766: evaṃ dvir api trir api yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5768: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5770: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ samgho itthannāmāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dadyāt /
V05bhivin_u:5773: iyam itthannāmā viṃśativarṣā kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā paripūraśikṣā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5776: yasyā āryamiśrikāṇāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye upasthāpanāsammutiṃ dīyamānāṃ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5780: dinnā āryamiśrikāyo itthannāmāye viṃśativarṣāye kumārībhūtāye deśitaśikṣāye paripūrṇaśikṣāya upasthāpanāsammutiḥ saṃghena /
V05bhivin_u:5781: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:5782: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5783: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5784: [1] paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavati tāṃ cāsaṃmatām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5785: paripūraśikṣā pi ca bhavatīti aṣṭādaśavarttehi dve varṣāṇi deśitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:5786_0: tāṃ cāsaṃmatām iti asaṃmatā evam asaṃmatā aparipūraśikṣā pi asaṃmatā tam ca se karma
V05bhivin_u:5786_1: karonti prajñaptivipannaṃ gaṇavipannaṃ anuśrāvaṇāvipannaṃ anyatarānyatareṇa karmopakleśena upakliṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5791: / [2] pūraviṃśativarṣā pi ca bhavati kumārībhūtā deśitaśikṣā ca paripūraśikṣā ca /
V05bhivin_u:5796: tā dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolīyakanyāyo gṛhicaritāyo pravrajitāyo paṭu kāyo uccakṣukāyo kṣipraniśāntikāyo /
V05bhivin_u:5798: labhyā dāni bhagavan ūnaviṃśativarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5806: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5807: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5808: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5812: yā eṣā gṛhicaritā ākāṅkṣati tathāgatapravedite dharmavinaye upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvaṃ sā tāya anugrāhitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5816: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
V05bhivin_u:5830: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5831: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5833: ko jānāti pūradvādaśavarṣā vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5834: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5836: yathā kumāribhūtāya aṣṭādaśavarṣāya dve varṣāṇi śikṣādeśanāsammutir yācitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5839: pūradvādaśavarṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā tāṃ cādeśitaśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //1 //
V05bhivin_u:5851: āryamiśrikāyo yato haṃ pravrajitā nāmabhijānāmy ahaṃ etad dharmam pratiṣevituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5852: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5855: na eṣā jānāty etaṃ dharma pratiṣevituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5857: yā dāni eṣā īdṛśī bhavati na kṣamati upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5858: atha khalu yadi tāvad dārikāṃ janayati yadā stanikā gṛhān nirgatā bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5859: atha dārakaṃ janayati yadā ayaṃ stanībhūto bhavati tato upasthāpayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5860: atha dāni tāye sālohito bhavati jñātiko vā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5861: vayaṃ etan dārakam upasthāsyāma iti upasaṃpādayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5862: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5865: deśitaśikṣā pi ca bhavati gṛhicaritā nāṃ aparipūraśikṣām upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //2 //
V05bhivin_u:5870: na kṣamati ūnadvādaśavarṣām gṛhicaritām upasthāpayitun ti /
V05bhivin_u:5871: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo pūradvādaśavarṣāṃ gṛhicaritāṃ deśitaśikṣām upasthāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:5873: asty eṣā deśitaśikṣā na tu jānāma paripūraśikṣa vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:5874: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5876: yathā kumārībhūtāye yāvat tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:5882: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpiya upasthāpiya nāvavadanti nānuśāsanti /
V05bhivin_u:5883: tāyo dāni indragavā iva vardhanti yāvat kathaṃ saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇe pratipattavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5886: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evañ ca nāmā yūyaṃ upasthāpayitvā nāvavadatha nānuśāsatha /
V05bhivin_u:5887: tena hi dve varṣāṇi ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5888: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5890: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavadeya nānuśāsayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5896: nāvavaded iti abhidharme vā abhivinaye vā /
V05bhivin_u:5899: nānuśāsed iti ācāram akurvantīm anācāraṃ kurvantīṃ na nirddhameyā na daṇḍakarma dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5900: atha dāni sā upasthāpitā durvacā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā nirddhamitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5901: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihārinaṃ nāvāvadati nānuśāsati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5903: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ dve varṣāṇi nāvavaden nānuśāset pācattikaṃ //4 //
V05bhivin_u:5907: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:5913: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5919: duṣkṛtaṃ vo bhikṣuṇīyo evaṃ nāma yūyam upasthāpitāḥ anyena gacchatha /
V05bhivin_u:5920: tena hi upasthāpitāya upasthāyikā dve varṣāṇi anubandhitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5921: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:5922: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:5923: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇi nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5929: nānubandhed iti yena gacchati tena na gacchati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5931: atha dāni sā upasthāyikā aśikṣākāmā bhavati śaithilikā vā bāhulikā vā /
V05bhivin_u:5933: sā me brahmacaryāntarāyo bhaveya dṛṣṭvānukṛtim āpadyantīyeti anyena gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5935: bhikṣur api upādhyāyaṃ dve varṣān nopasthihati nānubandhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5937: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāpitā upasthāyikāṃ dve varṣāṇī nopasthihen nānubandhet pācattikaṃ //5 //
V05bhivin_u:5943: kin nu khalv etaṃ labhyaṃ kartuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5947: tena hi na kṣamati anuvarṣam upasthāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5949: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5954: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayeti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5957: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī kṛtapuṇyā bhavati ekaṃ varṣaṃ śikṣā deśayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:5961: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anuvarṣam upasthāpayet pācattikam //6 //
V05bhivin_u:5966: sā antevāsinīṃ bhikṣuṇīhi upasaṃpādīyāna sthūlanandāṃ bhikṣuṇīm āha /
V05bhivin_u:5967: ārye mama antevāsinī upasampādyā sādhu ārye āryamiśrikānāṃ gaṇaṃ paryeṣehi /
V05bhivin_u:5971: tāya dāni aparaṃ divasaṃ bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ gaṇaṃ samudānayitvā upasaṃpādayitvā /
V05bhivin_u:5972: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo majāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5974: duṣkṛtaṃ te jete evan nāma tvaṃ ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:5976: tena hi na kṣamati gaṇam avajānituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5979: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ parivāsikinīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5983: upasthāpayed iti upasampādayen na bhikṣugaṇena pārājikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:5987: atha khalu pratikṛty eva tāva bhadrakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇo samudānayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:5988: atha dāni anye bhadrakāḥ anye abhadrakāḥ tathā kartavyaṃ yathā bhadrottarāṇi karmāṇi bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:5990: atha dāni gaṇam avajānāti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:5991: atha dāni senābhayaṃ vā bhavati paracakrabhayaṃ vā nagaroparodho vā kiñcāpi pārivāsikinīm upasthāpayety anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:5993: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekato viśuddhāṃ pārivāsikīnīm upasthāpayet pācattikaṃ //7 //
V05bhivin_u:5997: yā sā kālīya triyantarā lecchavidhītā upasthāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:5998: sā dāni āgārikehi ca sārdhaṃ saṃsṛṣṭā viharati /
V05bhivin_u:6000: ārye kāli yā dāni upasthāpitā tvaṃ jānāsi āgārikehi ca parivrājakehi ca saṃṣṛṣṭāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6001: kim arthaṃ na vyapakarṣasi na vyapakarṣāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:6002: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6004: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
V05bhivin_u:6005: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsu āpadāsu na vyapakarṣen na vyapakarṣāpayed antaśaḥ ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6009: tathārūpāsu āpadāsū ti svayam vā pratyodhāvitukāmā jñātikā vā pratyodhāvayitukāmā anyehi vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6010: na vyupakarṣatīti svayaṃ na vyupakarṣāpayatīti parehi /
V05bhivin_u:6011: antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti na dāni ṣaṭpañca ca paramaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6014: eṣā dāni bhikṣuṇīye sārdham vihāriṇī vā antevāsinī vā saṃsṛṣṭā bhavati vyapakarṣitavyā vā vyapakarṣāpayitavyā vā cārikāya varṇo bhāṣitavyaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6015: atha dāni jarādurbalāvā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti anyāhi bhikṣuṇīhi vyakpakarṣayitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6019: yadā vayaṃ taruṇīyo āsi evam asmābhir aṭitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6020: bhikṣur api sārdhaṃ vihāriṃ utkaṇṭhitan na vyapakarṣayati na vyapakarṣāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6022: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upasthāyikā upasthāpitāṃ tathārūpāsv āpadāsu na vyapakarṣayet na vyapakarṣāpayet antamasato ṣaṭpañca yojanā ti pācattikaṃ //81 //
V05bhivin_u:6028: tā indragavā viya vardhanti śivacchagalā viya vardhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6031: sā dāni bhikṣuṇīhi vuccati kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpitena yaṃ āryāmevaṃ vaktavyā anuśāsitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6033: kiṃ bhadrāyiṇīyo irṣyāpathā mama parṣām upasthāpayantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6034: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6036: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evan nāma tvaṃ kṣiyādharmam āpadyesi /
V05bhivin_u:6037: tena hi na kṣamati kṣiyādharmam āpadyituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6038: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati /
V05bhivin_u:6041: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evam ucyamānā /
V05bhivin_u:6043: yaṃ āryā evam vaktavyā anuśāsitavyety uktā samānā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6046: kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye ti daśahi aṅgehi samanvāgatā aṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:6052: yasyā imāni daśāṅgāni na samvidyante sā bhavati anaṅgopetā /
V05bhivin_u:6053: kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya ti vivācayet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6054: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi yucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6055: bhikṣur api bhikṣūhi vucyamāno kim punar āyuṣmato anaṅgopetasya upasthāpiteneti kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6057: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīhi evaṃ vucyamānā kim punar āryāye anaṅgopetāye upasthāpiteneti uktā kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya pācattikaṃ //9 //
V05bhivin_u:6062: sādhu me ārye nande upasaṃpādaya māṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6067: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6075: yā puna bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām evaṃ vādet /
V05bhivin_u:6076: yadā pūraśikṣā bhaviṣyasi tato ham upasthāpayiṣyan ti vaditvā naivopasaṃpādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6079: śikṣamāṇeti aṣṭādaśehi varttehi dve varṣāṇi deśtitaśikṣā /
V05bhivin_u:6080: evam vadeyā ti yathā sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇī /
V05bhivin_u:6082: atha dāni na pratibalā bhavati anyā adhyeṣitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6083: atha dāni naivātmanā upasthāpayati nāpy anyāṃ adhyeṣayati na visarjayati /
V05bhivin_u:6085: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇām uktvā ahan te upasthāpayiṣyan ti paścān nopasampādayen na visarjayet pācattikaṃ //10 //
V05bhivin_u:6089: atha bhadrā kāpileyī caturyuktaṃ yānam abhiruhitvā jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6092: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6094: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yānam abhiruhyet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6097: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ kolīyakanyāḥ lecchavikanyāś ca prakṛtisukumārāḥ pravrajitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6099: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6102: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6103: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6105: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:6106: glānyaṃ nāma jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā prakṛtisukumārā vā na śaknoti pada āgacchantu idam atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6107: yānan nāma hastiyānaṃ aśvayānam uṣṭrayānaṃ goyānaṃ gardabhayānaṃ nāvāyānaṃ śivikāyānaṃ yānayānam eva aṣṭamaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6110: yatra uṣṭrā vā goṇā vā yuktā bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6112: yahiṃ uṣṭrīyo vā goṇīyo vā yuktā bhavanti tahiṃ āruhitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6113: atha dāni asaṃjñikā bhavati na strīṃ na puruṣaṃ jānāti anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6114: atha dāni nāvāya aparāt param uttaraty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6115: ūrdhvaṅgāminīyam vā adhogāminīyam vā pratyayo adhiṣṭhihitavyo mā mariṣyāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:6116: bhikṣur api agilāno yānamabhiruhati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6119: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā yānam abhiruhet pācattikaṃ /rā //
V05bhivin_u:6123: bhadrā kāpileyī chatreṇa gṛhītena upānahābhyām ābaddhābhyāṃ jñātikulaṃ gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6125: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā adyāpīyaṃ pravrajitā pi mahacchandā /
V05bhivin_u:6126: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6131: tā dāni śākīyakanyāḥ lecchavikumārāḥ pravrajitā gacchantīyo ātapena dahyante /
V05bhivin_u:6132: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6135: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6137: agilānā ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattir gilānāye /
V05bhivin_u:6139: jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā va prakṛtisukumārā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6141: chatropānaha iti chatran nāma bhūrjachatraṃ tālachatraṃ veṇuchatraṃ parṇachatraṃ cailachatram /
V05bhivin_u:6145: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatran dhāreti na upānahāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6146: upānahān dhāreya na chatraṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6149: bhikṣur api picumastakādi chatraṃ dhāreti saṃpuṭām vā anirmokāṃ vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6151: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā chatropānahaṃ dhārayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6156: teṣāṃ śayyā āstṛtapratyāstṛtā dvikaḍevara trikaḍevarehi niśreṇīya āruhyati /
V05bhivin_u:6160: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6163: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:6166: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdasi abhinipadyasi /
V05bhivin_u:6167: tena hi na kṣamati atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdituṃ vā abhinipadyitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:6168: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6169: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6172: mañce vā pīṭhe vā ti caturdaśa mañcāḥ caturdaśa pīṭhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6174: abhinipadyeya vā ti śayyāṃ kalpayet pācatikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6176: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sakṛn niṣaṇṇā divasaṃ pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6177: atha puno puno niṣīdati tāvatyaḥ pācattikāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6178: atirekapramāṇaṃ bhūmau nikhanitvā upaviśati vā nipadyati vā anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6179: bhikṣur api atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā niṣīdati vā abhinipadyati vā vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6181: yā puna bhikṣuṇī atirekaprāmāṇike mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ //2 //
V05bhivin_u:6185: tā dāni ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6186: tāyo mañcāṃ bhañjanti biśikāṃ pāṭenti caturasrakāṃ pāṭenti /
V05bhivin_u:6187: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6192: yā puna bhikṣuṇī ekāstaraṇaprāvaraṇāṃ sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6196: śeyyā ti paṅgulamañco paṅgulapīṭho yāvat kaṭakilañjādayo /
V05bhivin_u:6201: trihi pīṭhehi dvihi janāhīti pādāṃ prāsārayantīhi tathā prasārayitavyāḥ yathā anyamanyasya jānukā nākrameyuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6203: tiryak prajñaptāyā tṛhi janehi śayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi yathā caturasrake yathā pīṭhe /
V05bhivin_u:6204: atha dāni tṛṇādi saṃstaro bhavati na kṣamati atibahuṃ ākramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6205: atha khu nirmuṣṭikaṃ samaṃ prajñāpayitavyaṃ pāṭiyakapāṭiyakehi pratyāstaraṇehi /
V05bhivin_u:6206: atha dāni śītam bhavati svakasvakāny antarīkaraṇāni kṛtvā ekaṃ saṃcelī kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6207: bhikṣur api sahaśayyāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6209: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sahaśayyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //3 //
V05bhivin_u:6213: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī sāṃghike vihāre śayyāsanaṃ rundhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:6215: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo yathāvṛddhikāya utthāpīyanti tasmin vihāre sāṃghikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6217: kim asya dāni sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ nirundhiya cārikāṃ prakramīyati /
V05bhivin_u:6219: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6222: etad eva pṛcchiyati yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:6224: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakaramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6225: tena hi na kṣamati sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsarivtā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6226: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6227: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6229: sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanan ti mañcam vā pīṭham vā bisikām vā caturasrakām vā kuccam vā bimbohanam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6231: cārikāṃ prakrameyā ti anyatra gacchet pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6232: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6233: prakramantīya vaktavyaṃ yathā paliguddhaṃ śayanāsanaṃ niḥsarāmīti /
V05bhivin_u:6235: atha dāni ekavastuko saṃghārāmo bhavati aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6237: yā puna bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam aniḥsaritvā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /ṇàüka //
V05bhivin_u:6249: kas tāvad atra doṣo 'yaṃ dāni ahaṃ anyadāpi anyadāpi snāpayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6252: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6254: sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6260: duṣkṛtan te gartodaramāte yāvad evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6261: tena hi na kṣamati yāvad bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:6262: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisamviditā anāhūtā upasamkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6264: sabhikṣukan ti antamasato yahiṃ ekabhikṣur api bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6265: saṃghārāman ti āraṇyakam vā grām'antikam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6271: etā dāni yo bhikṣuṇīyo pariveṇaṃ gacchanti dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā nivedayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6273: tenāpi dāni bhikṣuṇā bhikṣavo jānāpayitavyā mā dāni bhikṣū viprakaṭā bhaveṃsū ti /
V05bhivin_u:6274: yadi viprakaṭā bhonti mṛttikākarmeṇa vā iṣṭakākarmeṇa vā /
V05bhivin_u:6287: bhikṣur api apratisaṃvidito bhikṣunīupāśrayaṃ praviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6288: atha khu dvārakoṣṭhake sthitvā acchaṭikā kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6290: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sabhikṣukaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ pūrve apratisaṃviditā anāhūtā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //tṛ //
V05bhivin_u:6294: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6295: tehi dāni aparā strī vipravastapatikā uktā /
V05bhivin_u:6301: kaḥ punar evaṃ jñāsyati āgamiṣyati vā na veti /
V05bhivin_u:6302: tāya dinno pratiśrayo tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pratikrāntānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6304: so dāni khāditvā pibitvā kleśe pīḍito bhāryāya sārdhaṃ mśrībhūto /
V05bhivin_u:6305: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo tena śabdena pratibuddhāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6306: yā dāni avigatarāgāḥ tāsām asparśasaṃjñā utpannā /
V05bhivin_u:6307: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6315: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ jānantīyo saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjāsanaṃ śayyāṃ kalpayatha /
V05bhivin_u:6319: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni kośalehi janapadehi cārikāṃ carantīyo anyatarasmiṃ grāmavāsake vāsam upagatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6320: tāyo dāni sarvagrāmam aṇvitāḥ na kahiñcid apuruṣaṃ gṛhaṃ labhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6321: tā dāni rathyāyāṃ pratikrāntāḥ rātrau vātavṛṣṭir utthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6323: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6330: imaṃ gṛhaṃsuḥ imaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśatha dhūrtakānām iha bhayaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6334: na kṣamati sapuruṣake gṛhe śayyāṃ kārayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6335: tāyo tahiṃ rātrau dhūrtakehi viheṭhitāḥ tatrānyatarā brahmacaryāto cyāvitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6336: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6339: yā puna bhikṣunī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajjeśayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6340: tatrāyaṃ samayo vātasamayo vṛṣṭisamayo puruṣāśaṅkitasamayo ayam atra samayo //
V05bhivin_u:6342: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6343: saṃbhojanīyan ti strīyā puruṣo bhojanaṃ puruṣasyāpi strī bhojanaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6344: kulan ti brāhmakulaṃ yāvad rājakulaṃ yāni vā punar anyāny api kāñcit kulāni /
V05bhivin_u:6345: anupakhajja nāma vāsavastu yahiṃ bhāryāpatikā pratikramanti /
V05bhivin_u:6347: anyatra samaya iti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padam anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6356: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jānantīye saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6357: atha dāni jñāyate ayaṃ manuṣyaḥ śrāddho ālaptako vā kiñcāpi anupakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayanti anāpakhajjo śayyāṃ kalpayati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6359: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī saṃbhojanīye kule anupakhajje śayyāṃ kalpayed anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6365: bhikṣū dāni vaiśālīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ śrāvastīṃ prasthitāḥ bhagavato pādāvandāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6366: bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ bhikṣū kila bhagavato pādavandā gamiṣyantīti /
V05bhivin_u:6368: vandāmy ārya śruṇomaḥ āryamiśrāḥ śrāvastīyaṃ gamiṣyanti bhagavataḥ pādavandā /
V05bhivin_u:6374: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye saha adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyitum /
V05bhivin_u:6379: tāyo ekadvikāya divasāni gaṇayanti tadaho gamiṣyantīti /
V05bhivin_u:6380: tāyo dāni prakṛtyeva kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya mārge sthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6381: te ca bhikṣavo tāṃ velāṃ prasthitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6383: āyuṣmanto imāyo tāyo bhaginīyo śīghraśīghraṃ gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6387: tahiṃ dāni yā bhikṣuṇīyo taruṇīyo balavantīyo tāhi te bhikṣū anujavitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6388: yā taṃhi jarādurbalāyo vyādhidurbalāyo prakṛtisukumārāyo tāyo ce ehi muṣitāḥ paripiṭṭitāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:6389: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6391: evaṃ ca nāma tave tirorājyan tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā prakramatha /
V05bhivin_u:6392: tena hi na kṣamati tirorājyāṃ tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6394: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyaṃ tirojanapadaṃ asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6398: asārthikā ti sālo nāma gṛhi sārtho vā pravrajitasārtho vā śakaṭasārtho vā paryeṣitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6401: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī asārthikā cārikāṃ prakramati /
V05bhivin_u:6404: samaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6405: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ samaṃ praviśanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6407: viṣamaṃ prasthitāḥ viṣamaṃ praviśanti pācattikam āsādayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6408: bhikṣur api asārthiko sabhayaṃ sapratibhayaṃ sāśaṅkasammataṃ mārga pratipadyati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6410: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirorājyan tirojanapadam asārthikā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ // grā //
V05bhivin_u:6414: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni strībhiḥ saha udyānabhūmiṃ nirgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6416: tatra bhikṣuṇyaḥ strīveṣeṇa caṅkramanti ārāmagṛhakāni vanagṛhakāni citragṛhakāni nīrīkṣantīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6417: tāyo dāni gūḍhe pradeśe puruṣehi viheṭhitāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6418: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6420: antorājyaṃ kaṃ pi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6421: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6424: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakānīti ete dāni bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6425: caṃpakārāmā vā panasārāmā vā atimuktakārāmā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6427: nyagrodhavanā vā drākṣāvanā vā kadalīvanā vā dāḍimavanā vā mātuluṅgavanā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6428: citragṛhakānīti ete bhavanti sabhā vā kūṭāgārā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6432: na kṣamati ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6435: atha dāni tatraiva strībhiḥ saha cañcūryate anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6436: bhikṣur api ārāmagṛhaṃ vā vanagṛhaṃ vā citragṛhaṃ vā darśanāya gacchati yatra kāmopabhoginaḥ krīḍanti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6438: antorājyaṃ kaṃpi ca bhavati antorāṣṭraṃ pi /
V05bhivin_u:6439: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī ārāmagṛhakāni vā vanagṛhakāni vā citragṛhakāni vā darśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //8 //
V05bhivin_u:6443: sujātā nāma bhikṣuṇī āyuṣmato udāyiṣya purāṇadvitīyā /
V05bhivin_u:6447: yadā tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo gocaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ tadāyuṣmān udāyī kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā pātracīvaram ādāya tahiṃ praviṣṭo /
V05bhivin_u:6448: te dāni vihārasya paścāt vastuke ambarīyakeṇa niṣaṇṇā raktacittā karmaṇyenāṅgajātena anyamanyasya aṅgajātāni nidhyāyattā āsanti /
V05bhivin_u:6449: aparā dāni bhikṣuṇī mahallikā uccārakarmāya vā prasrāvakarmāya vā paścād vastukaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:6452: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6456: duṣkṛtan te sujātike yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6457: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6459: ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati anyo ca tatra bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:6460: supto matto unmattotkṣiptacitto vedanābhinno uttānaśayyāko amānuṣo tiryagyonigato /
V05bhivin_u:6468: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ sakṛn nisaṇṇā divasam pi niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6469: atha dāni puno puno ucchati ca niṣīdati ca tattikā pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6470: atha dāni dve janā bhavanti eko vihāraṃ praviśati kasyacid arthāya bhikṣuṇīya śīghram utthihitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6471: nāpi dāni sahasrām ājāneya māṃ eṣā viheṭhayitukāmā ti /
V05bhivin_u:6479: so āsādanāya na mocanāya kettāvatā antareṇāpattir bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6481: atha dāni ākīrṇajanamanuṣyo bhikṣuṇī upāśrayo bhavati niṣkramanti ca praviśanti ca sthapativardhakicitrakarāḥ kiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6482: atha dāni rathyāmukhaṃ dvāraṃ bhavati avīciḥ striyo ca puruṣā ca gacchanti akiñcāpi tehi kalpiyakārehi āsati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6483: atha dāni antarāvīciḥ chinnā bhavati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6485: atha dāni dve bhūmake kalpiyakāro tiṣṭhati trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6486: tatra vāyo vā vemāntareṇa trayāṇām anyatamānyataraṃ paśyaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6491: kin ti dāni asti darśanopavicāro na śramaṇopavicāraḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6492: prākṛtena cakṣuṣā paśyati bhikṣur eṣo āsati bhikṣuṇī veti no tu prākṛtena śrotreṇa tayor āyaṃ śṛṇoti /
V05bhivin_u:6495: grāme vāraṇye vā rātrau vā divā vā channe vā abhyavakaśe vā ekasya na mahājane santike na dūre /
V05bhivin_u:6497: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpayet pācattikaṃ //0 //
V05bhivin_u:6501: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā bhrātṛkehi bhrātṛputrakehi mātulehi mātulaputrakehi sārdhaṃ ekā ekena saha tiṣṭhati /
V05bhivin_u:6502: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni piṇḍapātaṃ aṇvantīyo dṛṣṭvā ojjhāyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6503: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekāya ekena raho niṣīdituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6504: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6512: ekāye ekena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ raho niṣīdituṃ yāvad bhagavān aha /
V05bhivin_u:6513: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6515: puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekeneti sā ca bhavati yāvad evam apy eṣā ekā ekena /
V05bhivin_u:6518: pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇā divasan niṣīdati ekaṃ pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6521: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ ekā ekena raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ //lṛṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6525: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatā /
V05bhivin_u:6526: bhrātṛduhitṛputrehi mātulaputrehi saha anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati saṃlapati upakarṇakaṃ jalpati /
V05bhivin_u:6528: kin tāvad imāye pravrajitāye upakarṇakaṃ jalpitena /
V05bhivin_u:6530: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye āhaṃsuḥ yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6531: yā puna bhikṣuṇī puruṣena sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya saṃtiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇam vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6533: puruṣeṇa sārdham iti gṛhasthena vā pravrājitena vā /
V05bhivin_u:6538: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhatum vā samlapitum vā upakarṇakam vā jalpitum vā /
V05bhivin_u:6541: atha dāni guhyaṃ jalpitavyaṃ bhavati bhittim vā kuḍyam vā stambham vā vṛkṣam vā yamanikām vā antarīkṛtvā jalpayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6542: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī puruṣeṇa sārdham anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇakam vā jalpati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6543: bhikṣur api striyā sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya tiṣṭhati vā saṃlapati vā upakarṇam vā jalpati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6545: yā puna bhikṣuṇīpuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ anto hastapāśasya santiṣṭheya vā saṃlapeya vā upakarṇaṃ vā jalpeya pācattikaṃ //1 // uddānaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6556: atha bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ gatvā putrabhrātṛbhāgineyānāṃ raho gatānāṃ andhakāre apratisamviditā sahasā chatti praviśati /
V05bhivin_u:6558: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye guatamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6562: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsaṃ andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6563: tena hi na kṣamati etad eva yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti
V05bhivin_u:6564: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6566: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6567: sapuruṣo ti yahiṃ puruso ti yahiṃ puruṣo bhaveya andhakāre apradīpiketi yahin na syāt tailapradīpo vā kaṇḍolkā vā /
V05bhivin_u:6568: upasaṃkrameya ti praviśeta pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6569: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikāya upasaṃkramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6570: atha dāni kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati yadi tahiṃ uccaśabdo bhavati praviśaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6571: atha dāni agnir na bhavati pratisaṃvedayitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6574: sa eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratisaṃvedayati nācchaṭikāṃ karoti upasaṃkramati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6575: bhikṣur api sastrīkam āvāsam andhakāre apratisaṃvidito upasaṃkramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6577: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī sapuruṣam āvāsam andhakāre apradīpikā upasaṃkrameya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6581: tāyo dāni ṣaḍvargiṇo bhikṣuṇīyo giryagrasamājaṃ gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6582: tā dāni tahiṃ gatvā pṛthag mañca gṛhṇanti naṭo nāṭayati saprahāsaṃ vastupadā nāṭitam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6584: tāyo dāni tūṣṇīkās tiṣṭhanti yogācarā iva /
V05bhivin_u:6585: yadā praśāntam bhavati nāṭakam avatāritaṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6590: te dāni vicakṣu kṛtā nelāṭikaṃ na prayacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6593: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6595: tena hi na kṣamati viśokadarśanāya gantuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6596: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6597: yā punar bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6599: viśokam iti naṭanartanakasallamallapāṇisvarikāḥ kumbhabhūmīrāḥ antamasato yahiṃ catvāro pi janāḥ sannipatanti krīḍyārthaṃ tahiṃ darśanāya gacchanti /
V05bhivin_u:6602: atha dāni bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram aṇvati paśyati devayānaṃ niṣkramantaṃ rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ niṣkrāntaṃ dāni śakyam akṣīṇi nimīlayituṃ kiñcāpi paśyati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6603: atha dāni ābhogaṃ karoti ime paśyāmi ito paśyāmīti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6604: atha dāni bhagavato mālyāropaṇaṃ bhavati upāsakopāsikā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6607: atha dāni tahiṃ kocic cittasya vikāro bhavati na kṣamati sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6608: bhikṣur api viśokadarśanāya gacchati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6610: yā puna bhikṣuṇī viśokadarśanāya gacchet pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6614_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam
V05bhivin_u:6614_1: āpannānāṃ viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupaśamāpayati
V05bhivin_u:6619: evaṃ nāma tvaṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayasi na vyupasamāpayasi na vyupasamanāyautsukyaṃ karosi /
V05bhivin_u:6622_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6622_1: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samanā adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamanāyautsukhyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6624: kalahajātānām iti vācākalahaṃ kurvantīnāṃ vātayuktaṃ mama yuktam ity ādi /
V05bhivin_u:6625: bhaṇḍanajātānām iti anyamanyaṃ mama ghaṭanaṃ kurvantīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6629: gurukā laghukā sapratikarmā apratikarmā sāvaśeṣā niravaśeṣā /
V05bhivin_u:6630: dharmakarma adharmakarma samagrakarma vyagrakarma yāvat sthānārhaṃ karma iti viharantīnāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6634: na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6635: etā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo kalahajātā bhaṇḍanajātā vigrahavivādam āpannā viharanti na dāni kṣamati tāyo adyupekṣituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6637: autsukyaṃ kartavyaṃ upasamanāya pratyāśaṃsitavyaṃ parasparaṃ kṣamāpayitavyāḥ prāptakālaṃ yathārūpaṃ paribhāṣayitavyāḥ samagrīkartvyāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6638: atha dāni na śaknoti anyā bhikṣuṇī adhyesitavyā udyojayitavyā upāsakopāsikāyo bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo /
V05bhivin_u:6639: atha tāny adhikaraṇāni karkkaśāni bhavanti durvyupasamāni teṣām eva adhikaraṇānāṃ kālam āgamayati samayam āgamayati paripākam āgamayati /
V05bhivin_u:6640_0: kālaṃ ca samayam ca paripākaṃ cāgamya vyupaśamayaty anāpattiḥ bhikṣur api bhikṣūṇāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6640_1: kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍaṇajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānām viharantānāṃ vṛṣabho samāno
V05bhivin_u:6640_2: adhikaraṇāni na vyupaśamayati na vyupasamāpayati na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ karoti
V05bhivin_u:6642_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīnāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigrahavivādam āpannānāṃ
V05bhivin_u:6642_1: viharantīnāṃ vṛṣabhī samānā adhikaraṇāni na vyupasamayen na vyupasamāpayen na vyupasamānāyautsukyaṃ
V05bhivin_u:6646: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī jñātikulaṃ nīyate udvartanāya snāpanāya gṛhapatinīhi nīyate /
V05bhivin_u:6647: vayam āryām udvartayāmaḥ snāpayiṣyāmaḥ asmākaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:6651: varṇalolāṃ udvartayanti kāleyakena tuṅgeyakena svaṅgakena padmakena gandhacūrṇehi /
V05bhivin_u:6655: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6659: evan nāma tvaṃ gṛhiṇīnām udvartnaparimardanasnāpanasammatena udvartāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:6661: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6662: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatāni tathārūpehi bhikṣuṇī agilānā udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6663: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnam iti kṣatriyakanyakānāṃ brāhmaṇakanyakānāṃ gṛhapatikanyakānāṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6664: udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatānīti kāleyakam vā tuṅgeyakam vā cikkasam vā /
V05bhivin_u:6665: yady eko vā tehi bhikṣuṇīhi agilānā udvartāpayet /
V05bhivin_u:6666: kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati udvartāpayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6668: atha dāni gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā bhavati labhyā bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6669: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā cikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6670: atha dāni vātasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā godhūmacikkasenāliṃpituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6671: atha dāni sannipāto bhavati saṃyuktehi bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayitavyaṃ parimardāpayitavyaṃ āliṃpitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6672: tāya pi dāni āliṃpiya na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6675: bhikṣur api agilāno cikkasenodvartāpayet parimardāpayed vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6677: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayeta parimardāpayeta pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6681: bhagavatā dāni śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6682: sā dāni bhadrā bhikṣuṇīhi udvartāpayati parimardāpayati /
V05bhivin_u:6686: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6689: agilānā ti kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti /
V05bhivin_u:6692: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayati na parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6696: bhikṣur api agilāno bhikṣuṇā udvartāpayati parimardāpayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6698: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā bhikṣuṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:6703: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śrāmaṇerīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:6707: śikṣamāṇā nāma aṣṭādaśahi vartehi dve varṣāṇi śikṣamāṇā yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6709: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā śikṣamāṇāya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ //grā //
V05bhivin_u:6716: yā puna bhikṣuṇī agilānā gṛhiṇīya udvartāpayet parimardāpayet pācattikaṃ // hrā //
V05bhivin_u:6727: yāvatikā kā viśuddhā ahan tāsām anyatamāsāṃ tatra nāgacchāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6728: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6733: tvañ ca nāma poṣadhan na satkaroṣi /
V05bhivin_u:6734: kā anyā satkariṣyati ko ca poṣadhasya satkāro /
V05bhivin_u:6737: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6738: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃagilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6740: anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhisaṃvāsaṃ ti cāturdaśikena vā cāturdaśikaṃ pāñcadaśikena vā pāñcadaśikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6743: eṣā bhavati jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā śirāviddhikā vā bhavati asukhā bhaiṣajyaṃ vā pītam bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:6746: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā poṣadhan na gacchati /
V05bhivin_u:6747: gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6748: bhikṣur api agilāno naiva poṣadhaṃ gacchati na cchandan deti vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6750: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ agilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsan na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6767: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvargikāḥ ovādakavāraṃ na labhanti /
V05bhivin_u:6772: āyuṣmāṃ cchāriputraḥ sa khilo ca mṛduko ca /
V05bhivin_u:6774: na kṣamati asammatena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīyo ovadituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6776: te dāni niḥsīmaṃ gatvā anyamanyaṃ saṃmanyitvā kalyato yeva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatvā āhaṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6779: yāyo yogācārāyo bhikṣuṇīyo tāyo na sannipatanti /
V05bhivin_u:6781: kim artham vayam eṣām avinītānām avavādaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6782: te dāni tāhi saha muhūrtam antaraṃ kākavaṃhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6783: āyuṣmān dāni śāriputro kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā ānandena paścāc chramaṇena sārdhaṃ vistareṇa /
V05bhivin_u:6797: ovaditā vayam āryamiśrakehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
V05bhivin_u:6798: athāyuṣmān śāriputro vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto prakrānto /
V05bhivin_u:6799: bhagavān jānanto yeva pṛcchati kin dāni gautamī mātā śīghram āgato si /
V05bhivin_u:6802: ahaṃ bhagavan kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā yāvad bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭo ovadituṃ mayoktaṃ sannipatatha bhaginīyo ovādo bhaviṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:6804: yāyo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo tā na sannipatanti /
V05bhivin_u:6813: na vayam āgamiṣyāmaḥ ovaditā vayam āryamiśrikehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena /
V05bhivin_u:6814: ahaṃ pi bhagavan vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto sannirgato /
V05bhivin_u:6818: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati /
V05bhivin_u:6821: duṣkṛtaṃ vo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhavanti /
V05bhivin_u:6822: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha māsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6826: bhikṣusaṃghe ovadopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6827: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā ghṛtapītikā vā bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6829: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na gacchati gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6830: yadā poṣadho bhavati tadā cchandahārikāhi bhikṣuvihāraṅ gatvā vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6831: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādāṃ cchirasā vandati poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati avavādaṃ ca yācati evaṃ trikkhatto yācitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6832: yadi tāvat kocid bhikṣuṇīovādako bhavati vaktavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6834: atha na kocid bhavati yo taṃhi aṅgopeto bhavati so saṃmanyitavyo /
V05bhivin_u:6836: nāsti bhaginīyo bhikṣuṇīovādako apramādena saṃpādetha āpattiñ ca poṣadhaṃ pratijāgratha sagauravā ca bhavatha sthavirehi bhikṣūhi madhyehi navakehīti /
V05bhivin_u:6838: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhipoṣadhaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:6842: jetāye bhikṣuṇīye saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam utpannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6849: so dāni pāṭayitvā dhovāyitvā upanāhayitvā gato /
V05bhivin_u:6851: tāhi dāni so pradeśo dṛṣṭo pūyamrakṣito /
V05bhivin_u:6857: sāhasam āryāya kṛtaṃ saṃbādhe pradeśe śastrakarma kārayantīya /
V05bhivin_u:6858: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6862: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ śastrakarma kārāpayasi /
V05bhivin_u:6865_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
V05bhivin_u:6865_1: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed
V05bhivin_u:6869: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastrakarma kārāpayiṣyan ti /
V05bhivin_u:6870: anavalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6871: śṛṇotu me āryā saṃgho yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma kārāpeya /
V05bhivin_u:6872: kārāpayiṣyati āryā saṃgho itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī śastrakarma /
V05bhivin_u:6873: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V05bhivin_u:6874: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6875: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6876_0: kaṇṭakena vā nakhena vā bhedāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni
V05bhivin_u:6876_1: adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa
V05bhivin_u:6876_2: pāṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam
V05bhivin_u:6876_3: vā bāhuśirām vā gulphaśirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha /
V05bhivin_u:6877_0: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam
V05bhivin_u:6877_1: vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed
V05bhivin_u:6881: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6882: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6886: duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi /
V05bhivin_u:6887: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6888: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:6889: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6892: upagatā ti purimikāṃ paścimikām vā varṣopanāmayikāṃ upagatā /
V05bhivin_u:6893: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6894: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ekarātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6895: atha dāni rājabhayam vā senābhayam vā paracakrabhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6896: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanākarma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanākarma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6898: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ //3 //
V05bhivin_u:6902: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6911: idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāmaramaṇīyā /
V05bhivin_u:6917: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam āryadhītā ihaiva jātā /
V05bhivin_u:6919: naiva kahiñci gacchati kūpamaṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati aniḥkramā /
V05bhivin_u:6920: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6922: tena hi varṣāvustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā /
V05bhivin_u:6924: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6926: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6927: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6928: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6929: bhikṣur api varṣāvusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6931: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ // ṇka //
V05bhivin_u:6935: sthūlanandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā /
V05bhivin_u:6936: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā /
V05bhivin_u:6937: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca /
V05bhivin_u:6938_0: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena
V05bhivin_u:6941: pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi /
V05bhivin_u:6942_0: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi anākalpasaṃpannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi
V05bhivin_u:6942_1: pāṭitavipāṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā
V05bhivin_u:6943: te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti /
V05bhivin_u:6944: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā /
V05bhivin_u:6945: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6947: śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan /
V05bhivin_u:6948: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat /
V05bhivin_u:6949: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6951: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati /
V05bhivin_u:6952: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6954: na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā vā kalahakārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti /
V05bhivin_u:6956: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6957: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6958: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvaragāmīvinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:6959: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ // tṛ //
V05bhivin_u:6967: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6979: sā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati /
V05bhivin_u:6983: bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto /
V05bhivin_u:6984: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam /
V05bhivin_u:6986: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:6987: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā /
V05bhivin_u:6992: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:6994: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya /
V05bhivin_u:6999: vā ti pareṇa kāyeṇa vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7001: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇām vā udvahati deśanāgāmivinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7004: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācā vā pācattikaṃ // phu //
V05bhivin_u:7008: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya uccāramallakaṃ apratyavekṣitvā rathyāyāṃ choritaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7009: tahiṃ dāni aparo brāhmaṇo śīrṣasnāto āhatavastranivastro tāya rathyāya atikramati /
V05bhivin_u:7012: janena copahāsitaṃ brāhmaṇa susnātaḥ suviliptas tvam iti /
V05bhivin_u:7015: itikitikāya dhīte śramaṇike na paśyasi mama śīrṣaṃ vastrāṇi ca viṣṭhena vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:7016: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7020: duskṛtan te evan nāma tvam apratyavekṣiya choresi /
V05bhivin_u:7021: tena hi na kṣamati apratyavekṣiya chorayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7022: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti /
V05bhivin_u:7023: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prāsrāvam vā kheṭakam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣitvā chorayet pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7025: tirokuḍyan ti tiraḥprakāram uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā vastradhovanam vā bhāṇḍadhovanam vā keśān vā nakhān vā /
V05bhivin_u:7030: yadi tāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā rathyā bhavanti ārāmayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7031: atha dāni anākīrṇā bhavanti kiñcāpi chorayaty anāpattiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7032: taṃ pi dāni na kṣamati aśabdakarṇikāye chorayituṃ api tu acchaṭikā dātavyā ukkāsitavyam vā /
V05bhivin_u:7033: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī naiva pratyavekṣati nāpi acchaṭikāṃ dattvā chorayati pācattikam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7034: bhikṣur api apratyavekṣya acchaṭikām akṛtvā chorayati vinayātikramam āsādayati /
V05bhivin_u:7036: yā puna bhikṣuṇī tirokuḍyaṃ uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭaṃ vā siṃghāṇakam vā vighasam vā saṃkāram vā apratyavekṣya choreya pācattikaṃ // grā //
V05bhivin_u:7041: rājño dāni prasenajitasya kośalasya pūrvakoṣṭhakaṃ nāma udyānam puṣkiriṇīsampannaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7042: anāvṛtaṃ bhikṣūnāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āvṛtaṃ itarāye janatāye /
V05bhivin_u:7044: ho bhaṇe ārāmika pūrvakoṣṭhakam udyānaṃ siktasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ karehi /
V05bhivin_u:7048_0: tāyo dāni pratikṛty eva gatvā tahiṃ haritaśādvalopastarāṇāyāṃ pakvakheṭena ca pakvasiṃghāṇakena
V05bhivin_u:7048_1: ca vināśayitvā padumapatrehi uccārasya puṭakāni bandhitvā puṣkiriṇīyaṃ pravāhayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7049: tāyo dāni divasaṃ tahiṃ kākāvāhāṃ bhañjiya sāyāhnasamaye nagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ rājā dāni prasenajita kośalo aparejjukāto niragato sāntaḥpuro /
V05bhivin_u:7050: tāyo dāni antaḥpurikāyo kathañcid eva samrodhād avamuktā randhanamokṣam iva manyamānāḥ cañcūryante /
V05bhivin_u:7052: kāścid ito ca ito ca dhāvanti avakāśaṃ gṛhṇanti śādvalopastaraṇe paribhrāmanti /
V05bhivin_u:7053: tāsāṃ dāni pakvakheṭena pakvasiṃghāṇakena vastrāṇi vināśitāni /
V05bhivin_u:7056: tāsāṃ bhavati kulaputrakehi śrutaṃ śvo rājā sāntaḥpuro udyānaṃ pravekṣyatīti tehi ete gandhapuṭakāḥ pravāhitā iti kṛtvā tāyo gṛhṇanti /
V05bhivin_u:7057: te udakena klinnā uccāreṇa cā khāditāḥ prakṛtisukumāraṃ ca padmapatraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7059: hī hī viṣṭhaṃ tā dāni rājño upasaṃkrāntā āhaṃsu /
V05bhivin_u:7060: mahārāja eṣa tāvad īdṛśī avasthā rājā āha śabdāpayatha ārāmikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7063: ho bhaṇe ārāmika kena udyānaṃ viṭṭālitaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7064: āha ṣaḍvargiṇīyo śramaṇīyo eva divasaṃ kākavāhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7067: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7068: mahāprajāpatī pi gautamī bhagavato ārocayet / yāvad
V05bhivin_u:7069: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7070: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7076: harite tṛṇe iti śādvale acchinnālūnasmiṃ udan ti udakāni nāma daśa /
V05bhivin_u:7077: nādikaṃ tāḍāgaṃ audupānikaṃ śvabhrodakaṃ praghārimaṃ vṛṣṭisthitaṃ ucchodakaṃ antarīkṣapānīyaṃ himavilīnaṃ sāmudram vā uccāram vā prasrāvaṃ vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7078: atha dāni prāvṛṣeṇyā se sarvabhumiḥ śādvalopastareṇā bhavati yahiṃ pradeśe svalpaharitam bhavati tahiṃ kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7079: atha dāni alpaharitaṃ na bhavati kaṭāhake vā iṣṭakāyam vā upale vā śuṣkatṛṇe vā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍe vā yatra vā anyena uccāro kṛto bhavati balīvardena vā /
V05bhivin_u:7080: yatra vā anyena manuṣyena kṛto tahiṃ kartavyaṃ atha dāni evaṃ na bhavati antamasato kanīyasiṃ pi aṅguliṃ upadrāhayitvā kartavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7081: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā tahim prathamam nipatati /
V05bhivin_u:7082: atha dāni caṅkramati na kṣamati haritaśādvale śleṣmaṃ chorayituṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7083: atha khu kaṭe vā patrapuṭikāyāṃ vā chorayitavyaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7085: yā puna bhikṣuṇī harite tṛṇe uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7086: yā puna bhikṣuṇī udake uccāram vā prasrāvam vā kheṭam vā siṃghāṇakam vā kuryāt pācattikaṃ //
V05bhivin_u:7092: prajāpati detha cchandakaṃ āryamiśrikāṇāṃ bhaktaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7094: tā dān āhaṃsuḥ āryā yaṃ divasaṃ saṃghabhaktaṃ kariṣyatha tadāsmākam api ārocayetha /
V05bhivin_u:7097: āyuṣmanto śāriputramaudgalyāyanau aniruddho revataḥ kapphiṇo śroṇakoṭīviṃśa upavāno āyuṣmān rāhulo ṣaḍvargikāś ca /
V05bhivin_u:7100: tahiṃ dāni bhikṣū kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca praviṣṭāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:7101: tato āyuṣmato śāriputrasya dātuṃ śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ dadhi ca /
V05bhivin_u:7102: āyuṣmato maudgalyāyanasya yavakodano māṣasūpo tailaṃ ca /
V05bhivin_u:7105: apareṣāṃ vyañjanāni dinnāni odano na dīyate /
V05bhivin_u:7106: apareṣāṃ śākaṃ dinnaṃ odano na dīyate /
V05bhivin_u:7109: tā dāni striyo bhakṣyabhojyam ādāya gatāḥ pṛcchanti /
V05bhivin_u:7111: tāyo dāni sthavirān bhikṣūn āvaritvā ṣaḍvargikān darśenti /
V05bhivin_u:7112: tatas teṣān dīyate śālinā modanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo ghṛtaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:7113: navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi gauḍan dadhi śvetaṃ dadhi kṣīraṃ samitāsamitaṃ yasyārthaṃ yāv arthaṃ dīyati /
V05bhivin_u:7114: yat kiñcit praṇītasammataṃ bhakṣyabhojyaṃ peyaṃ coṣmaṃ taṃ ṣaḍvargikāṇān dāpayanti /
V05bhivin_u:7115: ime te āryamiśrikāḥ bhikṣū pi bhuktavibhuktakāḥ utthāyotthāya bhagavataḥ pādavandā upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:7117: api tu śāriputra śobhane māsi mṛṣṭam vā praṇītam vā prabhūtam vā /
V05bhivin_u:7123_0: labdho bhagavan śālināmodanaṃ mudgānāṃ sūpo navanītaṃ ambu madhurāṇi vyañjanani gauḍan
V05bhivin_u:7123_1: dadhi kṣīraṃ yasyārthaṃ yāvad arthaṃ dīyati yathāpīdaṃ bhaginīnāṃ śraddhāprasannānāṃ parigrahe /
V05bhivin_u:7131: durbhuktaṃ te śāriputra evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viheṭhayantaṃ adhyupekṣasi /
V05bhivin_u:7132: yasya bhagavān durbhuktam ity āha tasya taṃ kalpam vā kalpāvaśeṣam vā tiṣṭheya naiva jarā gaccheya /

V05bhivin_u:7812: vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati /
V05bhivin_u:7813: tāhi tāye nūpurāṇi ābaddhāni karṇikā ābaddhā valayāni āviddhāni alaṅkṛtā rakṣoparaktehi vastrehi parihitā vāvāguṇṭhitā ca /

V05bhivin_u:7865: tāya dāni bhītāya tharatharāpantīya pātraṃ praṇāmitaṃ /

V05bhivin_u:7881: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya prākaṭena pātreṇa piṇḍāya aṭituṃ praticchādayitvā aṭitavyaṃ /

V05bhivin_u:8038: yadā te bhikṣū uttaritāḥ tadā bhikṣuṇīyo ekanāvāparipūrakena tāritāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8040: atha kho mahāprajāpatī gautamī sāyāhnasamaye parikilantehi mahābhūtehi bhagavato pādavandīkāṃ upasaṃkrāntā /
V05bhivin_u:8043: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato tad eva sarvam āroceti /

V05bhivin_u:8051: aṣṭābhir bhikṣuṇībhir yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyam u śiṣṭābhi yathāgatikāya // 0 //

V05bhivin_u:8283: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ ātmano pariṇāmayen niḥsargika /
V05bhivin_u:8288: bhikṣur api gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayati vinayātikramaḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8290: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇalābhaṃ pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ // lṛ //
V05bhivin_u:8300: vargāvaśeṣāḥ deśanā ca vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīnāñ ca ye daśa praṇītasammatam mātraṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8301: yāvat vāsādanā iha chadanā sahaśayyā ca /
V05bhivin_u:8304: araṇyāyāṃ ca śāṭikā dvāviṃśati śuddhekehi uddhārā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pravuccati /
V05bhivin_u:8305: deśanām uddharitvāna saṃcintyaṃ samodahe puno cātra //
V05bhivin_u:8306: atha puno vihāraṃ uddhariya bhaṇeya ko kuccaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8308: apanetvā samodahe cīvaraṃ puno tatra vijñaptim uddharitvāna aparihatā catu nirdiṣṭā /
V05bhivin_u:8311: tatra chādanā uddharitvāna udakahāsyaṃ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ /
V05bhivin_u:8314: samoho puno bhavati tatra eva tāvatā ca /
V05bhivin_u:8319: yate te bhūṣāḥ purimā ca sapta vargāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8322: yutaṃ yan bhikṣuṇīsūtre taṃ sarvam saṃkaletvāna śataṃ bhavati /
V05bhivin_u:8324: uddiṣṭā āryamiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
V05bhivin_u:8329: yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi // ḥ //
V05bhivin_u:8331: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantreti /
V05bhivin_u:8332: ekam idaṃ gautami samayaṃ tathāgato ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ viharati /
